K10bsu022_u:324: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāmaśvaratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthvīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantanto 'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati /
K10bsu022_u:325: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
K10bsu022_u:326: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
K10bsu022_u:327: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavanmaṇiratnamutpadyate śuddhanīlavaiḍūryamaṣṭāṃśaṃ suparikarmakṛtam /
K10bsu022_u:328: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayā sarvamantaḥpuramavabhāsyena sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu022_u:331: atha rātryāmardharātrasamaye 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ taṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre ucchrāpayitvā udyānabhūmiṃ niryāti subhūmidarśanāya /
K10bsu022_u:332: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayāsarvāvantaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyamavabhāsena sphuṭībhavati sāmantena yojanam /
K10bsu022_u:333: ye khalu punastasya maṇiratnasya sāmantake manuṣyāḥ prativasanti,
K10bsu022_u:336: anyonyamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭha bhadramukhāḥ karmāntāni kārayataḥ āpaṇāni prasārayata,
K10bsu022_u:338: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
K10bsu022_u:339: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
K10bsu022_u:341: sadṛśī kṣatriyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurī nātikṛṣṇā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā /
K10bsu022_u:347: sā rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ muktvā nānyasmin manasāpi rāgaṃ karoti kiṃ punaḥ kāyena /
K10bsu022_u:348: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
K10bsu022_u:349: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
K10bsu022_u:350: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavad gṛhapatiratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī divyacakṣuḥ /
K10bsu022_u:351: sa tena divyacakṣuṣā sāmantena yojanaṃ sasvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati,
K10bsu022_u:355: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
K10bsu022_u:356: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
K10bsu022_u:357: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhāṣibhiktasya pūrvavatpariṇāyakaratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
K10bsu022_u:359: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
K10bsu022_u:361: bhavati cāsya putrasahasraṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
K10bsu022_u:364: vāntachandarāgo netā ananyadevaḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti //
K10bsu022_u:365: tathā anye 'pi devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya pratyekabuddhebhya ārocayanti sma - riñcata mārṣā buddhakṣetram /
K10bsu022_u:367: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare golāṅgulaparivartane parvate mātaṅgo nāma pratyekabuddho viharati sma /
K10bsu022_u:368: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kardama iva śilāyāṃ prasthāya vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya ca tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvāṇo 'yam /
K10bsu022_u:373: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena vārāṇasyāṃ ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni viharanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:374: te 'pi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvānti sma /
K10bsu022_u:379: abhayadattāśca tasmin mṛgāḥ prativasanti iti tadagreṇa mṛgadāvasya mṛgadāva iti saṃjñodapādi //
K10bsu022_u:380: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthitaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:383: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kālavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
K10bsu022_u:384: na bodhisattva ādipravṛtte loke sattvasaṃvartanīkālasamaye mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati,
K10bsu022_u:385: atha tarhi yadā vyakto lokaḥ susthito bhavati,
K10bsu022_u:391: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo dvīpavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
K10bsu022_u:397: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvo deśavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
K10bsu022_u:399: yeṣu manuṣyā andhajātyā jaḍā eḍamūkajātīyā abhavyāḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāmarthaṃ jñātum /
K10bsu022_u:401: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kulavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
K10bsu022_u:402: na bodhisattvā hīnakuleṣūpapadyante caṇḍālakuleṣu vā veṇukārakule vā rathakārakule vā puṣkasakule vā /
K10bsu022_u:403: atha tarhi kuladvaye evopapadyante brāhmaṇakule kṣatriyakule ca /
K10bsu022_u:410: tamarthaṃ ca saṃpratītya bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:412: iti hi bhikṣavaste devaputrāḥ bodhisattvasyānyonyaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - katamasmin kularatne kiyadrūpāyāṃ jananyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhateti
K10bsu022_u:413: tatra kecidāhuḥ - idaṃ vaidehīkulaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:417: mātṛśuddhaṃ pitṛśuddhaṃ aplutaṃ cañcalamanavasthitaṃ parittapuṇyābhiṣyanditaṃ na vipulapuṇyābhiṣiktaṃ satkulapradeśopacāraṃ nodyānasarastaḍāgākīrṇaṃ karvaṭamiva pratyantavāsam /
K10bsu022_u:419: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ punaḥ kauśalakulaṃ mahāvāhanaṃ ca mahāparivāraṃ ca mahādhanaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:423: tathā hi - kauśalakulaṃ mātaṅgacyutyupapannaṃ na mātṛpitṛśuddham /
K10bsu022_u:424: hīnādhimuktikaṃ na ca kuloditaṃ na cāparimitadhanaratnanidhisamutthitam /
K10bsu022_u:426: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ vaṃśarājakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:430: tathāhi - vaṃśarājakulaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca caṇḍaṃ ca na cojjvalitatejasaṃ parapuruṣajanmāvṛtaṃ ca na mātṛpitṛsvatejaḥ karmābhinirvṛttaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:433: apare 'pyāhuḥ - iyaṃ vaiśālī mahānagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā
K10bsu022_u:446: apare tvevamāhuḥ - idaṃ pradyotakulaṃ mahābalaṃ ca mahāvāhanaṃ ca paracamūśirasi vijayalabdhaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:450: tathā hi - te caṇḍāśca capalāśca raudrāśca paruṣāśca sāhasikāśca,
K10bsu022_u:453: apara evamāhuḥ - iyaṃ mathurā nagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca /
K10bsu022_u:459: na yujyate caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya mithyādṛṣṭikule upapattum /
K10bsu022_u:461: apare 'pyāhuḥ - ayaṃ hastināpure mahānagare rājā pāṇḍavakulavaṃśaprasūtaḥ śūro vīryavān
K10bsu022_u:472: apara āhuḥ - iyaṃ mithilā nagarī atīva ramaṇīyā maithilasya rājñaḥ sumitrasya nivāsabhūmiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:480: evaṃ bhikṣavaste bodhisattvā devaputrāśca sarvasmin jambudvīpe ṣoḍaśajānapadeṣu yāni kāniciduccoccāni rājakulāni,
K10bsu022_u:483: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāṃ jñānaketudhvajo nāma devaputro 'vaivartiko bodhāya kṛtaniścayo 'sminmahāyāne /
K10bsu022_u:484: sa tāṃ mahatīṃ bodhisattvadevaparṣadametadavocat - etanmārṣā etameva bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya pariprakṣyāmaḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne kule caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti /
K10bsu022_u:485: sādhviti te sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paryaprākṣuḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne satpuruṣakularatne caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti //
K10bsu022_u:486: tato bodhisattvastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ devagaṇaṃ ca vyavalokya etadavocat - catuṣṣaṣṭyākārairmārṣāḥ saṃpannakulaṃ bhavati yatra caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyate /

K10bsu022_u:549: ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati yasmiṃścaramaḥ bhaviko bodhisattva utpadyate //
K10bsu022_u:550: dvātriṃśatā mārṣā guṇākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī bhavati yasyāḥ striyāścaramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati /

K10bsu022_u:555: pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇyā vyaktāyā vinītāyā viśāradāyā bahuśrutāyāḥ paṇḍitāyā aśaṭhāyā amāyāvinyā
K10bsu022_u:556: akrodhanāyā apagaterṣyāyā amatsarāyā acañcalāyā acapalāyā amukharāyāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyasaṃpannāyā

K10bsu022_u:560: na khalu punarmārṣāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati,
K10bsu022_u:562: evaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ puṣyanakṣatrayoge poṣadhaparigṛhītāyā mātuḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati //

K10bsu022_u:1246: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1247: sarve ca te deveśvarā ekaikamevaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mamaiva gṛhe bodhisattvamātā prativasati nānyatreti //
K10bsu022_u:1250: mahāvyūhāya sthitaḥ samādhiye acintiyā nirmita nirmiṇitvā /
K10bsu022_u:1251: sarveṣa devānabhiprāya pūritā nṛpasya pūrṇaśca tadā manorathaḥ // Lal_6.22 //
K10bsu022_u:1252: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste 'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti
K10bsu022_u:1253: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā /
K10bsu022_u:1254: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti //
K10bsu022_u:1255: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca
K10bsu022_u:1257: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe)
K10bsu022_u:1260: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
K10bsu022_u:1261: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1264: yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:1266: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt /
K10bsu022_u:1267: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
K10bsu022_u:1268: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā
K10bsu022_u:1269: brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1275: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
K10bsu022_u:1277: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:1278: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt //
K10bsu022_u:1279: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat - gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam - śabdamudīraya,
K10bsu022_u:1284: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ
K10bsu022_u:1285: bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ
K10bsu022_u:1287: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum /
K10bsu022_u:1288: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1289: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre)
K10bsu022_u:1290: sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā śīrṣavyavalokanenānuvilokayati sma unmeṣadhyāyikayā vā /
K10bsu022_u:1296: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1297: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
K10bsu022_u:1298: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
K10bsu022_u:1301: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1302: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet /
K10bsu022_u:1303: śakra āha - āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1305: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1306: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1310: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1311: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā /
K10bsu022_u:1312: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
K10bsu022_u:1314: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1315: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
K10bsu022_u:1318: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā (Vaidya 49)
K10bsu022_u:1321: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1322: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
K10bsu022_u:1324: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1325: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1326: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1327: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya /
K10bsu022_u:1328: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
K10bsu022_u:1329: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1330: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1331: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma //
K10bsu022_u:1332: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1333: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1334: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
K10bsu022_u:1335: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma //
K10bsu022_u:1336: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1337: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
K10bsu022_u:1338: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt
K10bsu022_u:1339: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma?
K10bsu022_u:1340: dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
K10bsu022_u:1342: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam
K10bsu022_u:1343: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:1344: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
K10bsu022_u:1345: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena //
K10bsu022_u:1346: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam /
K10bsu022_u:1347: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt /
K10bsu022_u:1348: (Vaidya 50) na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1349: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
K10bsu022_u:1352: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ
K10bsu022_u:1353: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
K10bsu022_u:1358: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1359: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
K10bsu022_u:1360: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
K10bsu022_u:1361: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca
K10bsu022_u:1362: mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ
K10bsu022_u:1363: mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1364: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
K10bsu022_u:1365: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1366: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma //
K10bsu022_u:1368: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
K10bsu022_u:1370: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛtto 'bhūt prabhāsvaro 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1371: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo 'tīva śobhate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1373: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
K10bsu022_u:1374: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
K10bsu022_u:1375: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1379: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1381: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1382: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:1384: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ
K10bsu022_u:1385: sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
K10bsu022_u:1387: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1389: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
K10bsu022_u:1391: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1392: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1395: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
K10bsu022_u:1396: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1397: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1398: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1399: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
K10bsu022_u:1402: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti /
K10bsu022_u:1403: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
K10bsu022_u:1404: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma,
K10bsu022_u:1406: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1407: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K10bsu022_u:1409: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1411: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
K10bsu022_u:1412: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
K10bsu022_u:1413: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1414: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
K10bsu022_u:1416: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1417: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
K10bsu022_u:1420: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1421: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu022_u:1422: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:1423: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1424: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1426: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
K10bsu022_u:1427: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma //
K10bsu022_u:1428: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite
K10bsu022_u:1430: puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ
K10bsu022_u:1431: draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum /
K10bsu022_u:1432: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
K10bsu022_u:1433: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1435: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
K10bsu022_u:1436: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
K10bsu022_u:1437: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1438: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
K10bsu022_u:1440: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
K10bsu022_u:1442: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:1443: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1445: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1447: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
K10bsu022_u:1448: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1449: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:1450: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo 'dhastādupariṣṭāt
K10bsu022_u:1451: santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
K10bsu022_u:1453: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
K10bsu022_u:1455: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
K10bsu022_u:1456: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1457: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma //
K10bsu022_u:1459: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
K10bsu022_u:1461: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1462: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1463: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
K10bsu022_u:1464: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1465: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1466: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1467: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1468: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
K10bsu022_u:1470: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
K10bsu022_u:1471: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1473: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:1475: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa
K10bsu022_u:1478: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1479: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1480: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1482: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
K10bsu022_u:1484: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
K10bsu022_u:1485: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma //
K10bsu022_u:1486: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya)
K10bsu022_u:1491: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1492: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
K10bsu022_u:1493: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:1501: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo 'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma //
K10bsu022_u:1503: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
K10bsu022_u:1504: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt /
K10bsu022_u:1506: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
K10bsu022_u:1507: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1508: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham //
K10bsu022_u:1509: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:1511: bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
K10bsu022_u:1512: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate // Lal_6.23 //
K10bsu022_u:1513: suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1514: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito // Lal_6.24 //
K10bsu022_u:1515: mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
K10bsu022_u:1516: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī // Lal_6.25 //
K10bsu022_u:1517: na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe /
K10bsu022_u:1518: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu // Lal_6.26 //
K10bsu022_u:1519: śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
K10bsu022_u:1520: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā // Lal_6.27 //
K10bsu022_u:1525: prayānti sarvi hṛṣṭacitta varṇamāla bhāṣato // Lal_6.28 //
K10bsu022_u:1526: ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
K10bsu022_u:1527: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu // Lal_6.29 //
K10bsu022_u:1528: vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
K10bsu022_u:1529: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā // Lal_6.30 //
K10bsu022_u:1530: athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
K10bsu022_u:1531: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite // Lal_6.31 //
K10bsu022_u:1532: yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
K10bsu022_u:1533: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam // Lal_6.32 //
K10bsu022_u:1534: no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
K10bsu022_u:1535: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate // Lal_6.33 //
K10bsu022_u:1536: aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
K10bsu022_u:1537: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram // Lal_6.34 //
K10bsu022_u:1539: ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
K10bsu022_u:1540: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu // Lal_6.35 //
K10bsu022_u:1541: rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
K10bsu022_u:1542: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu // Lal_6.36 //
K10bsu022_u:1543: so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
K10bsu022_u:1544: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati // Lal_6.37 //
K10bsu022_u:1549: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan
K10bsu022_u:1552: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1553: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1555: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1558: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
K10bsu022_u:1560: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1561: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1562: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1563: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1564: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1565: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1566: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10bsu022_u:1567: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1569: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:1572: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:1574: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1579: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1581: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:1584: atha khalu māyādevī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamayaṃ jñātvā bodhisattvasyaiva tejonubhāvena rātryāṃ prathame yāme rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:1585: deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me aciraciracireṇā jāta udyānabuddhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1586: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ kṣipramahu vrajeyā krīḍaudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.1 //
K10bsu022_u:1587: tvamiha tapasi khinno dharmacittaprayukto ahu ca cirapraviṣṭā śuddhasattvaṃ dharentī /
K10bsu022_u:1588: drumavara pratibuddhāḥ phullitā śālavṛkṣāḥ yukta bhaviya devā gantumudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.2 //
K10bsu022_u:1589: ṛtupravara vasanto yoṣitāṃ maṇḍanīyo bhramaravaravighuṣṭāḥ kokilabarhigītāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1590: śuciruciravicitrā bhrāmyate puṣpareṇuḥ sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ // Lal_7.3 //
K10bsu022_u:1595: nīlagirinikāśāṃ meghavarṇānubaddhāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ gajānām /
K10bsu022_u:1596: maṇikanakavicitrāṃ hemajālopagūḍhāṃ ghaṇṭarucirapārśvān ṣaḍviṣāṇāṃ gajendrān // Lal_7.5 //
K10bsu022_u:1597: himarajatanikāśāṃ muñjakeśāṃ sukeśāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ hayānām /
K10bsu022_u:1598: kanakaracitapārśvā kiṅkiṇījālalambā pavanajavitavegā vāhanā pārthivasya // Lal_7.6 //
K10bsu022_u:1600: viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ suśīghraṃ māya saparivārāṃ rakṣathā apramattā // Lal_7.7 //
K10bsu022_u:1602: maṇikanakaniṣiktāṃ lumbinīṃ kārayadhvaṃ vividhavasanaratnaiḥ sarvavṛkṣāṃ pravethā /
K10bsu022_u:1603: vividhakusumacitraṃ nandanaṃ vā surāṇāṃ vadatha ca mama śīghraṃ sarvametaṃ vidhāya // Lal_7.8 //
K10bsu022_u:1604: vacanamimu niśamyā pāriṣadyaiḥ kṣaṇena vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā /
K10bsu022_u:1606: jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ sarva kṛtu yathoktaṃ kāru deva pratīkṣa // Lal_7.9 //
K10bsu022_u:1607: so ca naravarendro hṛṣṭacitto bhavitvā gṛhavaramanuviṣṭo iṣṭikānevamāha /
K10bsu022_u:1608: yasya ahu manāpo yā ca me prītikāmā sā mi kuruta ājñāṃ maṇḍayitvātmabhāvam // Lal_7.10 //
K10bsu022_u:1609: varasurabhisugandhāṃ bhāvaraṅgāṃ vicitrāṃ vasana mṛdumanojñāṃ prāvṛṇothā udagrāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1610: urasi vigalitānāṃ muktahārā bhavethā ābharaṇavibhūṣāṃ darśayethādya sarvāḥ // Lal_7.11 //
K10bsu022_u:1612: bhūya kuruta harṣaṃ devakanyāna yūyaṃ śrutva madhuraghoṣaṃ devatāpi spṛheyuḥ // Lal_7.12 //
K10bsu022_u:1613: ekarathavaresmiṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ māyadevī mā ca puruṣa istrī anya tatrāruheyā /
K10bsu022_u:1614: nāri vividhavarmā taṃ rathaṃ vāhayantāṃ mā ca pratikūlaṃ mā manāpaṃ śruṇeṣyā // Lal_7.13 //
K10bsu022_u:1615: hayagajarathapattīṃ sainyaśrīmadvicitrāṃ dvāri sthita nṛpasyā śrūyate uccaghoṣāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1618: māya yada gṛhāto nirgatā dvāramūlaṃ ghaṇṭa śatasahasrā tāḍitā maṅgalārtham // Lal_7.15 //
K10bsu022_u:1619: so ca ratha vicitro maṇḍitaḥ pārthivena api ca marusahasrairdivyasiṃhāsanebhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:1620: caturi ratanavṛkṣā patrapuṣpopapetā abhinaditamanojñāṃ haṃsakrauñcān mayūrān // Lal_7.16 //

K10bsu022_u:1997: sūkṣmaṃ ca kampate bhūmiḥ bhavitā tattvadarśakaḥ // Lal_7.54 //

K10bsu022_u:2005: atītānāmapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvānāṃ saptarātrajātānāṃ janetryaḥ kālamakurvanta /
K10bsu022_u:2007: vivṛddhasya hi bodhisattvasya paripūrṇendriyasyābhiniṣkrāmato māturhṛdayaṃ sphuṭet //
K10bsu022_u:2009: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase yādṛśenaiva vyūhena māyādevī kapilavastuno mahānagarādudyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāntābhūt,
K10bsu022_u:2010: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇottareṇa mahāvyūhena bodhisattvaḥ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ prāvikṣat /
K10bsu022_u:2011: tasya ca praviśataḥ pañca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi gandhodakaparipūrṇāni purato nīyante sma /

K10bsu022_u:2016: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi vicitrapaṭalakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2017: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi navavicitrapralambanamālāparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /

K10bsu022_u:2025: cattvāriṃśatpadātisahasrāṇi śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgurūpiṇāṃ saṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacānāṃ bodhisattvaṃ gacchantamanugacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2026: gaganatalagatāni cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānyabhijñātāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacaradevaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nānāprakrāramanekavyūhairbodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanto 'nugacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2029: viṃśati ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni ratnasūtraparigṛhītāni taṃ rathaṃ vahanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2030: dvayoścāpsarasormadhye ekā mānuṣī kanyā dvayormānuṣīkanyayormadhye ekāpsarā /
K10bsu022_u:2032: na ca mānuṣā apsarasāṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramādamāpadyante sma yadidaṃ bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvena //
K10bsu022_u:2033: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kapilāhvaye puravare sarvārthasiddhāya pañcamātraiḥ śākyaśataiḥ pañcagṛhaśatāni nirmāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvamuddiśya /

K10bsu022_u:2043: tataścopādāya kumārasyeha sarvārthasiddhaḥ sarvārthasiddha iti saṃjñāmagamat //
K10bsu022_u:2044: tatra rājā śuddhodanasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuvartanārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvagṛheṣu praveśya caturṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādbodhisattvaṃ svagṛhe praveśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2047: tatra te bṛddhavṛddhāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatyaivaṃ mataṃ cārayanti sma - kā nu khalu samarthā
K10bsu022_u:2048: bodhisattvaṃ gopāyituṃ kelayituṃ mamāyituṃ hitacittatayā maitracittatayā guṇacittatayā
K10bsu022_u:2052: tatra mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyā evamāhuḥ - sarvā etā vadhūkā navā dahnāstaruṇyaḥ rūpayauvanamadamattāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2054: atha ca punariyaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumārasya mātṛsvasā /
K10bsu022_u:2057: iti hi te sarve samagrā bhūtvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmutsāhayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2058: iti hi mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ saṃvardhayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2059: tatra bodhisattvasyārthe dvātriṃśaddhātryaḥ saṃsthāpitā abhuvan aṣṭāvaṅgadhātryaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:2063: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaivaṃ mīmāṃsate sma - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kumāro rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī,
K10bsu022_u:2065: tena ca samayena himavataḥ parvatarājasya pārśve asito nāma maharṣiḥ prativasati sma pañcābhijñaḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena /
K10bsu022_u:2067: gaganatalagatāṃśca devaputrān buddhaśabdamanuśrāvayato 'mbarāṇi ca bhrāmayata itastataḥ pramuditān bhramato 'drākṣīt /
K10bsu022_u:2069: sa divyena cakṣuṣā sarvaṃ jambudvīpamanuvilokayannadrākṣīt kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare
K10bsu022_u:2070: rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāraṃ jātaṃ śatapuṇyatejastejitaṃ sarvalokamahitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātram /
K10bsu022_u:2071: dṛṣṭvā ca punarnaradattaṃ māṇavakamāmantrayate sma - yat khalu māṇavaka jānīyā jambudvīpe mahāratnamutpannam /

K10bsu022_u:2074: rājā bhaviṣyati caturaṅgaścakravartī vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājo jānapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2076: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
K10bsu022_u:2078: asya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
K10bsu022_u:2082: tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho netā ananyaneyaḥ śāstā loke saṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2084: atha khalvasito maharṣiḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādabhyudgamya samutplutya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat
K10bsu022_u:2085: upasaṃkramya ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃhṛtya padbhyāmeva kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:2088: iti hi bhikṣavo 'sito maharṣiḥ paśyati sma rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhadvāre 'nekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni /
K10bsu022_u:2089: atha khalvasito maharṣirdauvārikamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya,
K10bsu022_u:2091: parameti dauvāriko 'sitasya maharṣeḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā śuddhodanastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:2092: upasaṃkramya kṛtāñjalipuṭo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - yat khalu deva jānīyā ṛṣirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dvāre sthitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2093: evaṃ ca vadati - rājānamahaṃ draṣṭukāma iti /
K10bsu022_u:2094: atha rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerāsanaṃ prajñāpya taṃ puruṣamevamāha - praviśatu ṛṣiriti /
K10bsu022_u:2095: atha sa puruṣo rājakulānniṣkramyāsitaṃ maharṣimevamāha - praviśeti //
K10bsu022_u:2097: upasaṃkramya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - jaya jaya mahārāja,
K10bsu022_u:2100: atha sa rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerarghapādyamarcanaṃ ca kṛtvā sādhu suṣṭhu ca parigṛhya āsanenopanimantrayate sma /
K10bsu022_u:2101: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ cainaṃ jñātvā sagauravaḥ supratīta evamāha - na smarāmyahaṃ tava ṛṣe darśanam /
K10bsu022_u:2104: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocat - putraste mahārāja jātastamahaṃ draṣṭukāma ihāgata iti //
K10bsu022_u:2107: ṛṣiravocat - na mahārāja tādṛśā mahāpuruṣāściraṃ svapanti /
K10bsu022_u:2109: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhasattvo 'sitasya maharṣeranukampayā jāgaraṇanimittamakarot /
K10bsu022_u:2110: atha khalu rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvārthasiddhaṃ kumāramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya asitasya maharṣerantikamupanāmayati sma
K10bsu022_u:2111: iti hi asito maharṣirbodhisattvamavalokya dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatamaśītyanuvyañjanasuvicitragātraṃ
K10bsu022_u:2113: dṛṣṭvā codānamudānayati sma - āścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūta,
K10bsu022_u:2114: mahāścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūtaḥ ityutthāyāsanātkṛtāñjalipuṭo bodhisattvasya
K10bsu022_u:2115: caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca bodhisattvamaṅkena parigṛhya nidhyāyannavasthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:2116: so 'drākṣīdbodhisattvasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yaiḥ samanvāgatasya puruṣapudgalasya dve gatī bhavato nānyā /
K10bsu022_u:2118: sacetpunaragārādanagārikāṃ pravrajati tathāgato bhaviṣyati vighuṣṭaśabdaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2119: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārodīdaśrūṇi ca pravartayan gambhīraṃ ca niśvasati sma //
K10bsu022_u:2121: adrākṣīdrājā śuddhodano 'sitaṃ maharṣiṃ rudantamaśrūṇi ca pravartayamānaṃ gambhīraṃ ca niśvasantam /
K10bsu022_u:2122: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃharṣitaromakūpajātastvaritatvaritaṃ dīnamanā asitaṃ maharṣimetadavocat - kimidamṛṣe rodasi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi gambhīraṃ ca
K10bsu022_u:2124: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - nāhaṃ mahārāja kumārasyārthena rodimi,
K10bsu022_u:2128: ahaṃ ca mahārāja jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2130: abhisaṃbudhya cānuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacilloke sahadharmeṇa /
K10bsu022_u:2131: sadevakasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
K10bsu022_u:2132: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyati /
K10bsu022_u:2133: asmāttaṃ dharmaṃ śratvā jātidharmāṇaḥ sattvā jātyā parimokṣante /
K10bsu022_u:2141: evameva mahārāja kadācitkarhicidbahubhiḥ kalpakoṭinayutairbuddhā bhagavanto loke utpadyante /
K10bsu022_u:2145: vayaṃ ca taṃ buddharatnaṃ na drakṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2146: ityeva tadahaṃ mahārāja rodimi paridīnamanā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasāmi yadahamimaṃ nārogye 'pi rādhayiṣyāmi //
K10bsu022_u:2147: yathā hyasmākaṃ mahārāja mantravedaśāstreṣvāgacchati - nārhati sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro 'gāramadhyāvasitum /
K10bsu022_u:2149: tathā hi mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samānvāgataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2152: anena mahārāja prathamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2155: ūrṇā mahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya bhruvo rmadhye jātā himarajataprakāśā /
K10bsu022_u:2182: dīrghāṅguliradhaḥkramatalayormahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya cakre jāte ci (arciṣmatī prabhāsvare site)
K10bsu022_u:2185: anena mahārāja dvātriṃśattamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2186: na ca mahārāja cakravartināmevaṃvidhāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
K10bsu022_u:2188: saṃvidyante khalu punarmahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya kāye 'śītyanuvyañjanāni,

K10bsu022_u:2451: evaṃ ca trisahasra devamanujā ye keci mānāśritāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2453: yaṃ loko hyabhivandya lābha labhate svargaṃ tathā nirvṛtim // Lal_8.5 //
K10bsu022_u:2454: asmin khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena devakule praveśe saṃdarśyamāne dvātriṃśatāṃ devaputraśatasahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpadyante /
K10bsu022_u:2455: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yenopekṣako bodhisattvo bhavati sma devakulamupanīyamāna iti //
K10bsu022_u:2460: atha khalu bhikṣava udayano nāma brāhmaṇo rājñaḥ purohita udāyinaḥ pitā,
K10bsu022_u:2461: sa pañcamātrairbrāhmaṇaśataiḥ parivṛto hastottare citrānakṣatre rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyādābharaṇāni kumārāya kriyantāmiti /
K10bsu022_u:2464: tatra rājñā śuddhodanena pañcamātraiśca śakyaśataiḥ pañcamātrāṇyābharaṇaśatāni kāritānyabhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:2465: tadyathā - hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni mūrdhābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni mudrikābharaṇāni
K10bsu022_u:2467: pādukā nānāratnasamalaṃkṛtā hārāḥ kaṭakā harṣā mukuṭāni /
K10bsu022_u:2468: kārayitvā ca puṣyanakṣatrayogenānuyuktena te śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - hanta deva maṇḍyatāṃ kumāra iti /
K10bsu022_u:2469: rājā āha - alamalaṃkṛtaśca pūjitaśca bhavadbhiḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2474: tatra rātrau vinirgatāyāmāditya udite vimalavyūhanāmodyānaṃ tatra bodhisattvo nirgato 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:2476: aśītiśca strīsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
K10bsu022_u:2477: daśa ca kanyāsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
K10bsu022_u:2478: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma /
K10bsu022_u:2485: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya purato masipiṇḍa upanikṣipto na bhāsati na tapati na virocate,
K10bsu022_u:2486: evameva tānyābharaṇāni bodhisattvasya kāyaprabhayāspṛṣṭāni na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante sma /
K10bsu022_u:2487: evaṃ yā yā ābharaṇavikṛtirbodhisattvasya kāya ābadhyate sma,
K10bsu022_u:2488: sā sā jihmībhavati sma tadyathāpi nāma masipiṇḍaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:2489: tatra vimalā nāmodyānadevatā sā audārikamātmabhāvamabhisaṃdarśya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ gāthābhirabhibhāṣate sma -
K10bsu022_u:2490: sarveyaṃ trisahasra medinī sanagaranigamā pūrṇā kāñcanasaṃcitā bhavet surucira vimalā /
K10bsu022_u:2492: ekā kākiṇi jāmbukāñcane bhavati upahatā nā bhāsī itaraḥ sa kāñcana prabhasirirahitaḥ // Lal_9.1 //
K10bsu022_u:2495: nā bhāsī na tapī na śobhate na ca prabhavati
K10bsu022_u:2496: ābhāye sugatasya kāyi no bhavati yatha masiḥ // Lal_9.2 //
K10bsu022_u:2500: śakrabahmaprabhā na bhāsate purata śirighane // Lal_9.3 //
K10bsu022_u:2503: apanethā bharaṇā ma heṭhatā abudha budhakaraṃ
K10bsu022_u:2508: vṛddhiḥ śākyakulanandasya cottamā bhaviṣyati vipulā // Lal_9.5 //
K10bsu022_u:2509: ityuktvā sā devatā bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya tatraivāntaradhāt //
K10bsu022_u:2515: tadā māṅgalyaśatasahasraiḥ lipiśālāmupanīyate sma daśabhirdārakasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:2520: bodhisattvaṃ prekṣamāṇāḥ kusumāni ca kṣipanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2521: aṣṭau ca marutkanyāsahasrāṇi vigalitālaṃkārābharaṇālaṃkṛtāni ratnabhadraṃkareṇa gṛhītāni mārgaṃ śodhayantyo bodhisattvasya purato gacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2523: sarve ca śākyagaṇāḥ śuddhodanaṃ rājānaṃ puraskṛtya bodhisattvasya purato gacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2526: atha viśvāmitro nāma dārakācāryo bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamāno dharaṇitale niviṣṭo 'dhomukhaḥ prapatati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2527: taṃ tathā prapatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śubhāṅgo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro dakṣiṇena karatalena parigṛhyotthāpayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2528: utthāpya ca gaganatalastho rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣat -
K10bsu022_u:2529: śāstrāṇi yāni pracalanti manuṣyaloke saṃkhyā lipiśca gaṇanāpi ca dhātutantram /
K10bsu022_u:2530: ye śilpayoga pṛthu laukika aprameyāḥ teṣveṣu śikṣitu purā bahukalpakoṭyaḥ // Lal_10.1 //
K10bsu022_u:2531: kiṃ tū janasya anuvartanatāṃ karoti lipiśālamāgatu suśikṣitu śiṣyaṇārtham /
K10bsu022_u:2532: paripācanārtha bahudāraka agrayāne anyāṃśca sattvanayutānamṛte vinetum // Lal_10.2 //
K10bsu022_u:2533: lokottareṣu catusatyapathe vidhijño hetupratītyakuśalo yatha saṃbhavanti /
K10bsu022_u:2534: yatha cānirodhakṣayu saṃsthitu śītibhāvaḥ tasminvidhijña kimatho lipiśāstramātre // Lal_10.3 //
K10bsu022_u:2535: netasya ācariya uttari vā triloke sarveṣu devamanujeṣvayameva jeṣṭhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2537: nāmāpi teṣa lipināṃ na hi vittha yūyaṃ yatreṣu śikṣitu purā bahukalpakoṭyaḥ // Lal_10.4 //
K10bsu022_u:2538: so cittadhāra jagatāṃ vividhā vicitrā ekakṣaṇena ayu jānati śuddhasattvaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2539: adṛśyarūparahitasya gatiṃ ca vetti kiṃ vā puno 'tha lipino 'kṣaradṛśyarūpām // Lal_10.5 //
K10bsu022_u:2540: ityuktvā sa devaputro bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ kusumairabhyarcya tatraivāntardadhe /
K10bsu022_u:2543: atha bodhisattva uragasāracandanamayaṃ lipiphalakamādāya divyārṣasuvarṇatirakaṃ samantānmaṇiratnapratyuptaṃ viśvāmitramācāryamevamāha - katamāṃ me bho upādhyāya lipiṃ śikṣāpayasi /
K10bsu022_u:2544: brāhmīkharoṣṭīpuṣkarasāriṃ aṅgalipiṃ vaṅgalipiṃ magadhalipiṃ maṅgalyalipiṃ aṅgulīyalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2545: śakārilipiṃ brahmavalilipiṃ pāruṣyalipiṃ drāviḍalipiṃ kirātalipiṃ dākṣiṇyalipiṃ ugralipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2546: saṃkhyālipiṃ anulomalipiṃ avamūrdhalipiṃ daradalipiṃ khāṣyalipiṃ cīnalipiṃ lūnalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2547: hūṇalipiṃ madhyākṣaravistaralipiṃ puṣpalipiṃ devalipiṃ nāgalipiṃ yakṣalipiṃ gandharvalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2548: kinnaralipiṃ mahoragalipiṃ asuralipiṃ garuḍalipiṃ mṛgacakralipiṃ vāyasarutalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2550: utkṣepalipiṃ nikṣepalipiṃ vikṣepalipiṃ prakṣepalipiṃ sāgaralipiṃ vajralipiṃ lekhapratilekhalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2551: anudrutalipiṃ śāstrāvartāṃ gaṇanāvartalipiṃ utkṣepāvartalipiṃ nikṣepāvartalipiṃ pādalikhitalipiṃ
K10bsu022_u:2555: āsāṃ bho upādhyāya catuṣṣaṣṭīlipīnāṃ katamāṃ tvaṃ śiṣyāpayiṣyasi?
K10bsu022_u:2556: atha viśvāmitro dārakācāryo vismitaḥ prahasitavadano nihatamānamadadarpa imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:2561: vaktraṃ cāsya na paśyāmi mūrdhānaṃ tasya naiva ca /
K10bsu022_u:2562: śiṣyayiṣye kathaṃ hyenaṃ lipiprajñāya pāragam // Lal_10.8 //
K10bsu022_u:2568: iti hi bhikṣavo daśa dārakasahasrāṇi bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ śiṣyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:2569: tatra bodhisattvādhisthānena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ mātṛkāṃ vācayatāṃ yadā akāraṃ parikīrtayanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:2616: iti hi bhikṣavasteṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ mātṛkāṃ vācayatāṃ bodhisattvānubhāvenaiva pramukhānyasaṃkhyeyāni dharmamukhaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma //
K10bsu022_u:2619: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yacchikṣito 'pi bodhisattvo lipiśālāmupāgacchati sma //
K10bsu022_u:2625: athāpareṇa samayena kumārastadanyaiḥ kumārairamātyaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣigrāmavalokayituṃ gacchati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2626: avalokya ca kṛṣikarmāntamanyata udyānabhūmiṃ praviśati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2627: saṃvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo 'nucaṃkramyamāṇo 'nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṃ darśanīyam /
K10bsu022_u:2630: āsādya ca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2631: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2632: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan /
K10bsu022_u:2634: yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamusaṃpadya viharati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2635: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma //
K10bsu022_u:2636: tena ca samayena pañca ṛṣayo bāhyāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ṛddhimanto vihāyasaṃgamā dakṣiṇāyā diśa uttarāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2637: te tasya vanakhaṇḍasyopari gacchantaḥ pratyāhatā iva na śaknuvanti sma gantum /
K10bsu022_u:2639: vayamiha maṇivajrakūṭaṃ giriṃ merumabhyudgataṃ tiryagatyarthavaistārikaṃ gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṃ vṛkṣavṛndāṃ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ
K10bsu022_u:2640: vayamiha marūṇāṃ pure cāpyasaktā gatā yakṣagandharvaveśmani cordhvaṃ nabhe niśritā ima puna vanakhaṇḍamāsādya sīdāma bhoḥ kasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam // Lal_11.1 //
K10bsu022_u:2642: atha yā tatra vanakhaṇḍadevatā sā tānṛṣīn gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
K10bsu022_u:2644: ayamiha vanamāśrito dhyānacintāparo devagandharvanāgendrayakṣārcito bhavaśataguṇakoṭisaṃvardhitastasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam // Lal_11.2
K10bsu022_u:2646: tataste 'dhastādavalokayanto 'drākṣuḥ kumāraṃ śriyā tejasā ca jājvalyamānam /
K10bsu022_u:2659: āho vajradharasya caiva pratimā candro 'tha sūryo hyayam /
K10bsu022_u:2660: kāmāgrādhipatiśca vā pratikṛtī rūdrasya kṛṣṇasya vā
K10bsu022_u:2661: śrīmān lakṣaṇacitritāṅgamanagho buddho 'tha vā syādayam // Lal_11.3 //
K10bsu022_u:2663: tataḥ sā vanadevatā tānṛṣīn gāthayā pratyabhāṣat -
K10bsu022_u:2664: yā śrī ca vaiśravaṇe ca vai nivasate yā vā sahasrekṣaṇe
K10bsu022_u:2666: brahme yā ca sahāpatau nivasate kṛṣṇe ca yā ca śriyā
K10bsu022_u:2667: sā śrī prāpya imaṃ hi śākyatanayaṃ nopaiti kāṃcitkalām // Lal_11.4 //
K10bsu022_u:2668: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante /
K10bsu022_u:2669: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam /
K10bsu022_u:2673: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati // Lal_11.5 //
K10bsu022_u:2676: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagadbhāsayiṣyati // Lal_11.6 //
K10bsu022_u:2679: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagattārayiṣyati // Lal_11.7 //
K10bsu022_u:2682: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjaganmocayiṣyati // Lal_11.8 //
K10bsu022_u:2685: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ jātimṛtyupramocakam // Lal_11.9 //
K10bsu022_u:2687: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2688: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma /
K10bsu022_u:2692: tato 'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam /
K10bsu022_u:2693: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt /
K10bsu022_u:2694: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2695: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:2697: yathā śakro 'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate // Lal_11.10 //
K10bsu022_u:2699: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam // Lal_11.11 //
K10bsu022_u:2700: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:2703: hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2704: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam // Lal_11.12 //
K10bsu022_u:2706: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman /
K10bsu022_u:2707: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka // Lal_11.13 //
K10bsu022_u:2708: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2709: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ - mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti /
K10bsu022_u:2713: dhyāyantaṃ girinicalaṃ narendraputraṃ siddhārthaṃ na jahati saiva vṛkṣachāyā // Lal_11.14 //
K10bsu022_u:2715: grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṃpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṃprakīrṇe /
K10bsu022_u:2718: chando 'bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama locanārtham /
K10bsu022_u:2719: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṃgham // Lal_11.16 //
K10bsu022_u:2720: madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2721: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so 'buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam // Lal_11.17 //
K10bsu022_u:2723: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṃskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti // Lal_11.18 //
K10bsu022_u:2724: so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṃstaru saṃstaritvā /
K10bsu022_u:2725: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṃ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ // Lal_11.19 //
K10bsu022_u:2726: pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum /
K10bsu022_u:2727: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto // Lal_11.20 //
K10bsu022_u:2728: vaya meruparvatavaraṃ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2729: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṃ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha // Lal_11.21 //
K10bsu022_u:2730: avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṃ tahi jambumūle /
K10bsu022_u:2731: jambunadārcisadṛśaṃ prabhatejaraśmiṃ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam // Lal_11.22 //
K10bsu022_u:2733: te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu /
K10bsu022_u:2734: sādho sujāta sumukhaṃ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṃ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān // Lal_11.23 //
K10bsu022_u:2735: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṃ yatha padmapatram /
K10bsu022_u:2736: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya // Lal_11.24 //
K10bsu022_u:2737: śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2738: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ // Lal_11.25 //
K10bsu022_u:2739: śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
K10bsu022_u:2740: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam // Lal_11.26 //
K10bsu022_u:2741: so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
K10bsu022_u:2742: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam // Lal_11.27 //
K10bsu022_u:2743: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
K10bsu022_u:2744: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ // Lal_11.28 //
K10bsu022_u:2745: paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
K10bsu022_u:2746: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena // Lal_11.29 //
K10bsu022_u:2748: so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2749: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa // Lal_11.30 //
K10bsu022_u:2750: yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:2751: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra // Lal_11.31 //
K10bsu022_u:2752: anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
K10bsu022_u:2753: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_11.32 //
K10bsu022_u:2759: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:2760: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt /
K10bsu022_u:2761: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:2763: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2765: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
K10bsu022_u:2767: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
K10bsu022_u:2774: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
K10bsu022_u:2776: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
K10bsu022_u:2781: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2782: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti //
K10bsu022_u:2786: kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
K10bsu022_u:2787: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ // Lal_12.2 //
K10bsu022_u:2790: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:2791: saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām /
K10bsu022_u:2792: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti // Lal_12.3 //
K10bsu022_u:2793: ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2794: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām // Lal_12.4 //
K10bsu022_u:2795: na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
K10bsu022_u:2796: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā // Lal_12.5 //
K10bsu022_u:2797: so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
K10bsu022_u:2798: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā // Lal_12.6 //
K10bsu022_u:2799: yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
K10bsu022_u:2800: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta // Lal_12.7 //
K10bsu022_u:2801: yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
K10bsu022_u:2802: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate 'pramattā // Lal_12.8 //
K10bsu022_u:2803: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
K10bsu022_u:2805: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā // Lal_12.9 //
K10bsu022_u:2806: satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
K10bsu022_u:2807: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā // Lal_12.10 //
K10bsu022_u:2808: na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
K10bsu022_u:2809: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema // Lal_12.11 //
K10bsu022_u:2810: śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
K10bsu022_u:2811: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva // Lal_12.12 //
K10bsu022_u:2813: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare /
K10bsu022_u:2815: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
K10bsu022_u:2817: na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2820: brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
K10bsu022_u:2821: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya // Lal_12.13 //
K10bsu022_u:2822: na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2823: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ // Lal_12.14 //
K10bsu022_u:2825: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma
K10bsu022_u:2827: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:2828: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā
K10bsu022_u:2829: śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ
K10bsu022_u:2832: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
K10bsu022_u:2835: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī // Lal_12.15 //
K10bsu022_u:2837: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
K10bsu022_u:2838: mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2839: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ // Lal_12.16 //
K10bsu022_u:2841: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
K10bsu022_u:2844: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca /
K10bsu022_u:2850: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni /
K10bsu022_u:2851: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
K10bsu022_u:2854: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat /
K10bsu022_u:2855: rājāpi śuddhodano 'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma - yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
K10bsu022_u:2857: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum //
K10bsu022_u:2859: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo 'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2860: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
K10bsu022_u:2861: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma //
K10bsu022_u:2862: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
K10bsu022_u:2863: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:2866: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
K10bsu022_u:2872: sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ?
K10bsu022_u:2875: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
K10bsu022_u:2878: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā,
K10bsu022_u:2881: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
K10bsu022_u:2885: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2886: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
K10bsu022_u:2891: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /
K10bsu022_u:2893: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma //
K10bsu022_u:2895: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2896: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha - deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
K10bsu022_u:2897: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum?
K10bsu022_u:2901: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma - saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati /
K10bsu022_u:2903: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:2904: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt - yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:2906: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2907: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma /
K10bsu022_u:2908: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2909: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato 'bhūt //
K10bsu022_u:2912: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
K10bsu022_u:2915: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma //
K10bsu022_u:2918: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
K10bsu022_u:2926: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ
K10bsu022_u:2927: lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma /
K10bsu022_u:2928: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate //
K10bsu022_u:2933: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi // Lal_12.17 //
K10bsu022_u:2936: saṃsārapurātu bahirdhā eka kṣapiṣyati prajñabalena // Lal_12.18 //
K10bsu022_u:2937: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman
K10bsu022_u:2938: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ //
K10bsu022_u:2939: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2940: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2941: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe 'bhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:2943: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_12.19 //
K10bsu022_u:2944: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām /
K10bsu022_u:2945: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate 'yam // Lal_12.20 //
K10bsu022_u:2948: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
K10bsu022_u:2949: sa sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti /
K10bsu022_u:2953: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti
K10bsu022_u:2959: dvāvapi trayo 'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:2960: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ //
K10bsu022_u:2972: īdṛśī ca iyaṃ prajñā buddhirjñānaṃ smṛtirmatiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2973: adyāpi śikṣate cāyaṃ gaṇitaṃ jñānasāgaraḥ // Lal_12.22 //
K10bsu022_u:2975: ekakaṇṭhāścemāṃ vācamabhāṣanta - jayati jayati bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:2976: sarve cāsanebhya utthāya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bodhisattvaṃ namaskṛtya rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocan - lābhāste mahārāja paramasulabdhāḥ,
K10bsu022_u:2977: yasya te putra evaṃ śīghralaghujavacapalaparipṛcchāpratibhāna iti //
K10bsu022_u:2978: atha sa rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi putra arjunena gaṇakamahāmātreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃkhyājñānakauśalyagaṇanāgatimanupraveṣṭum?
K10bsu022_u:2980: athārjuno gaṇakamahāmātro bodhisattvamevamāha - jānīṣe tvaṃ kumāra koṭiśatottarāṃ nāma gaṇanāgatim?
K10bsu022_u:3007: iti hi tallakṣaṇagaṇanayā sumerūparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet /
K10bsu022_u:3009: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3016: yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ daśa gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3018: yatra koṭīśataṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepāḥ parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3020: yatra tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ ca sarvaṃdharmābhiṣekābhimukhaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3021: bodhisattvaṃ nānyaḥ kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate ya etāṃ gaṇanāṃ prajānāti
K10bsu022_u:3045: nirdiśatu kumāro yojanapiṇḍaṃ kiyanti tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi bhavantīti /
K10bsu022_u:3047: triṃśacca koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiśca koṭīśatāni dvātriṃśatiśca koṭyaḥ pañca
K10bsu022_u:3048: ca daśaśatasahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca sahasrāṇi etāvān yojanapiṇḍaḥ paramāṇurajonikṣepasya /
