K10bsu022_u:3541: ayu kālu tavā upasthitaḥ samayo niṣkramaṇāya suvrata // Lal_13.94 //
K10bsu022_u:3544: saṃskāra pralopadharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ ca lepanam /
K10bsu022_u:3545: nadikūla ivā savālukaṃ pratyayādhīna svabhāvadurbalāḥ // Lal_13.96 //
K10bsu022_u:3547: anavasthita mārutopamāḥ phenapiṇḍave asāra durbalāḥ // Lal_13.97 //
K10bsu022_u:3549: māyopama cittamohanā bālaullāpana ukta muṣṭivat // Lal_13.98 //
K10bsu022_u:3550: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi cā sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
K10bsu022_u:3551: anyonya pratītya hetutaḥ tadidaṃ bālajano na budhyate // Lal_13.99 //
K10bsu022_u:3552: yatha muñja pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
K10bsu022_u:3554: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate eṣa ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā // Lal_13.100 //
K10bsu022_u:3556: ekaikaśa teṣu vartinī pūrvaparāntata nopalabhyate // Lal_13.101 //
K10bsu022_u:3557: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
K10bsu022_u:3558: na ca tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā // Lal_13.102 //
K10bsu022_u:3559: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te saṃskāre na santi tattvataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3560: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya eke prakṛtīnirīhakāḥ // Lal_13.103 //
K10bsu022_u:3562: na ca tatra na caiva śāśvato eva saṃskārānucchedaśāśvatāḥ // Lal_13.104 //
K10bsu022_u:3564: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpa niśrita rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi // Lal_13.105 //
K10bsu022_u:3568: akahiṃ ca gataṃ anāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati // Lal_13.107 //
K10bsu022_u:3570: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
K10bsu022_u:3571: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate // Lal_13.108 //
K10bsu022_u:3572: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
K10bsu022_u:3573: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate // Lal_13.109 //
K10bsu022_u:3574: skandhadhātvāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
K10bsu022_u:3575: sāmagri tu sattvasūcanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate // Lal_13.110 //
K10bsu022_u:3577: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate // Lal_13.111 //
K10bsu022_u:3579: mana vāca adṛśyarūpiṇī bāhyato 'bhyantara nopalabhyate // Lal_13.112 //
K10bsu022_u:3581: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarvā vāca pratiśrutakopamām // Lal_13.113 //
K10bsu022_u:3582: yatha tantri pratītya dārū ca hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
K10bsu022_u:3584: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
K10bsu022_u:3586: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgataḥ śabdagamanāgamanaṃ na labhyate // Lal_13.115 //
K10bsu022_u:3587: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
K10bsu022_u:3588: yogī puna bhūtadaśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati // Lal_13.116 //
K10bsu022_u:3589: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya adhyātmika śūnya bāhyakāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3591: iya īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkara darśane tvayā /
K10bsu022_u:3592: anubuddha svayaṃ yathātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣāṃ // Lal_13.118 //
K10bsu022_u:3595: tvayi yasya kṛtena paṇḍitā dattu dānaṃ bahukalpakoṭiṣu /
K10bsu022_u:3596: saṃprāpya hi bodhimuttamāṃ āryadhanasaṃgraha kariṣya prāṇinām // Lal_13.120 //
K10bsu022_u:3597: tāṃ pūrvacarīmanusmarā nārya dhanahīna daridra duḥkhitām /
K10bsu022_u:3598: mā upekṣahi sattvasārathe āryadhanasaṃgrahi teṣu kurvahi // Lal_13.121 //
K10bsu022_u:3599: tvayi śīla sadā surakṣitaṃ pithanārthāya apāyabhūminām /
K10bsu022_u:3602: tāṃ pūrvacarīmanusmarā baddhvā dvāra nirayāya bhūminām /
K10bsu022_u:3603: svargāmṛtadvāra muñcahī ṛddhyahi śīlavato vicintitam // Lal_13.123 //
K10bsu022_u:3604: tvayi kṣānti sadā surakṣitā pratighakrodhaśamārtha dehinām /
K10bsu022_u:3605: bhāvārṇava sattva tāriyā sthāpayiṣye śivi kṣemi nirjvale // Lal_13.124 //
K10bsu022_u:3607: mā upekṣa vihiṃsacāriṇaḥ kṣāntibhūmīya sthape imaṃ jagat // Lal_13.125 //
K10bsu022_u:3608: tvayi vīrya yadartha sevitaṃ dharmanāvaṃ samudānayitvanā /
K10bsu022_u:3609: uttārya jagadbhavārṇavāt thapayiṣye śivi kṣemi nirjvale // Lal_13.126 //
K10bsu022_u:3611: laghu vīryabalaṃ parākramā sattva saṃtārayahī anāyakāṃ // Lal_13.127 //
K10bsu022_u:3612: tvaya dhyānakileśadhyeṣaṇā bhāvitā yasya kṛtena sūratā /
K10bsu022_u:3613: bhrāntendriya prākṛtendriyāṃ kvapi cittāryapathe sthapeṣyaham // Lal_13.128 //
K10bsu022_u:3615: mā upekṣahi kleśupadrutāṃ dhyānaikāgri sthapehimāṃ prajām // Lal_13.129 //
K10bsu022_u:3617: tvayi prajña purā subhāvitā mohavidyāndhatamovṛte jage /
K10bsu022_u:3620: dadahī varaprajña suprabhā dharmacakṣuṃ vimalaṃ nirañjanam // Lal_13.131 //
K10bsu022_u:3622: yaṃ śrutva middhaṃ vivarjiyā cittu preṣeti varāgrabodhaye // Lal_13.132 //
K10bsu022_u:3627: tathā hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo dīrgharātraṃ sagauravo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3628: dharmeṣu dharmabhāṇakeṣu cādhyāśayena dharmārthiko dharmakāmo dharmaratirato 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3633: dharmalayano dharmatrāṇo dharmaśaraṇo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmaparāyaṇaḥ dharmanidhyāptiḥ kṣāntiniryātaḥ prajñāpāramitācarita upāyakauśalyagatiṃ gataḥ //
K10bsu022_u:3634: tatra bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mahopāyakauśalyavikrīḍitena sarvāntaḥpurasya yathādhimuktyā īryāpathamupadarśya,
K10bsu022_u:3642: paripākakālamavekṣamāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvastasmin samaye pūrvapratijñāmanusmarati sma,
K10bsu022_u:3652: tatra bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāntata eva suviditasaṃsāradoṣaḥ saṃskṛtenādhyāśayenānarthikaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3655: pravrajyābhilāṣī niṣkramaṇābhiprāyo vivekanimno vivekapravaṇo vivekaprāgbhāraḥ āraṇyaprāraṇyābhimukhaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3657: hitakāmaḥ sukhakāmo yogakṣemakāmo lokānukampako hitaiṣī maitrīvihārī mahākāruṇikaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3660: prayuktatyāgaḥ prayatapāṇiḥ tyāgaśūro yaṣṭayajñaḥ susamṛddhapuṇyaḥ susaṃgṛhītapuṇyaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3676: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati pratikṛtiḥ - evaṃ dharmavihārī evaṃ guṇamāhātmyavihārī evaṃ sattvārthābhiyuktavihārī abhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3678: sa tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrveṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ caramabhavopagatānāmantaḥpuraparipācitāni (Vaidya 132)
K10bsu022_u:3686: imāni catvāri dharmamukhānyāmukhīkṛtya bodhisattvaḥ sarvasyāntaḥpurasya paripācanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskaroti
K10bsu022_u:3687: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena tebhyaḥ saṃgītirutebhyo bodhisattvānubhāvenemānyevaṃrūpāṇi dharmamukhaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma / tadyathā -
K10bsu022_u:3688: udārachandena ca āśayena adhyāśayenā karuṇāya prāṇiṣu /
K10bsu022_u:3689: utpadyate cittu varāgrabodhaye śabde ca rūpasturiyebhi niścarī // Lal_13.133 //
K10bsu022_u:3690: śraddhā prasādo adhimukti gauravaṃ nirmānatā onamanā gurūṇām /
K10bsu022_u:3691: paripṛcchanā kiṃkuśalaṃgaveṣaṇā anusmṛtībhāvanu śabda niścarī // Lal_13.134 //
K10bsu022_u:3692: dāne dabhe saṃyamaśīlaśabdaḥ kṣāntīya śabdastatha vīryaśabdaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3693: dhyānābhinirhārasamādhiśabdaḥ prajñā upāyasya ca śabda niścarī // Lal_13.135 //
K10bsu022_u:3694: maitrāya śabdaḥ karuṇāya śabdo muditāupekṣāya abhijñaśabdaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3702: anirodhaśabdaśca anālayaṃ ca nirvāṇaśabdasturiyebhi niścarī // Lal_13.139 //
K10bsu022_u:3704: yaṃ śrutva sarvā pramadā nu śikṣitā varāgrasattve praṇidhenti bodhaye // Lal_13.140 //
K10bsu022_u:3705: iti hi bhikṣavo antaḥpuramadhyagatena bodhisattvena tāni caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇi
K10bsu022_u:3706: paripācitānyabhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bahūni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ye
K10bsu022_u:3708: tathā abhiniṣkramaṇakāle tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya hrīdevo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro
K10bsu022_u:3709: 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sa rātrau praśāntāyāṃ dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasraiḥ
K10bsu022_u:3712: cyuti darśitā atiyaśā janma ca saṃdarśitaṃ puruṣasiṃha /
K10bsu022_u:3714: paripācitā ti bahavo deva manuja loki dharmamanuprāpya /
K10bsu022_u:3715: ayamadya kālasamayo niṣkramye mati vicintehi // Lal_13.142 //
K10bsu022_u:3716: na hi baddha mocayātī na cāndhapuruṣena darśiyati mārgaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3717: muktastu mocayātī sacakṣuṣā darśayati mārgaḥ // Lal_13.143 //
K10bsu022_u:3718: ye sattva kāmadāsā gṛhe dhane putrabhāryapariśraddhāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3719: te tubhya śiṣyamāṇā naiṣkramyamatau spṛhāṃ kuryuḥ // Lal_13.144 //
K10bsu022_u:3720: aiśvarya kāmakrīḍā catudvīpā sapta ratna vijahitvā /
K10bsu022_u:3721: niṣkrānta tvāṃ viditvā spṛhayetsanarāmaro lokaḥ // Lal_13.145 //
K10bsu022_u:3722: kiṃ cāpi dhyānasaukhyairviharasi dharmairna cāsi kāmarataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3723: atha puna ciraprasuptāṃ bodhaya marumānuṣaśatāni // Lal_13.146 //
K10bsu022_u:3728: uttāraya pratijñāṃ kuruṣva cārthaṃ suragaṇānām // Lal_13.148 //
K10bsu022_u:3730: te tṛpta yeṣa prajñā āryā lokottarā virajā // Lal_13.149 //
K10bsu022_u:3731: tvamiha priyo manāpo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya rāṣṭrasya /
K10bsu022_u:3734: śīghraṃ pramokṣamārge sthāpaya śānte asamavīrā // Lal_13.151 //
K10bsu022_u:3740: drakṣyāma bodhiprāptaṃ niruttaraṃ dharma śroṣyāmaḥ // Lal_13.154 //
K10bsu022_u:3741: drakṣyati ca bhujagarājo bhavanaṃ avabhāsitaṃ tava śirīye /
K10bsu022_u:3744: dāsyāma caturi pātrāṃ bodhidhvaji pūrṇamanasasya // Lal_13.156 //
K10bsu022_u:3746: adhyoṣiṣye narendraṃ vartenti niruttaraṃ cakram // Lal_13.157 //
K10bsu022_u:3748: utpatsye 'yaṃ satya ti drakṣyāmyabhibudhyato bodhim // Lal_13.158 //
K10bsu022_u:3749: satyaṃ hi bodhisattvā antaḥpuriye kriyā vidarśenti /
K10bsu022_u:3750: pūrvaṃgamo bhava tvaṃ mā bheṣyasi paścimasteṣām // Lal_13.159 //
K10bsu022_u:3752: bhūtaṃ tathā avitathā jinaghoṣarutaṃ udīrehi // Lal_13.160 //
K10bsu022_u:3757: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ saṃcoditaḥ san tena devaputreṇa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyemaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3758: svapnamupadarśayati sma - yadrājā śuddhodanaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato 'drākṣīt bodhisattvaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3761: sa pratibuddhaḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukīyaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kaccit kumāro 'ntaḥpure 'sti?
K10bsu022_u:3763: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure śokaśalyo hṛdaye 'nupraviṣṭo 'bhūt - abhiniṣkramiṣyati avaśyaṃ kumāro 'yam /
K10bsu022_u:3768: tato rājñā śuddhodanena kumārasya paribhogārthaṃ trayo yathartukāḥ prāsādāḥ kāritā abhūvan graiṣmiko vārṣiko haimantikaśca /
K10bsu022_u:3772: ekaikasya ca prāsādasya sopānāni pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyutkṣipanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:3774: teṣāṃ tathotkṣipyamāṇānāṃ nikṣipyamāṇānāṃ ca śabdo 'rdhayojane śrūyate sma - mā khalu kumāro 'nabhijñāta evābhiniṣkramiṣyatīti /
K10bsu022_u:3776: tato rājā maṅgaladvārasya mahānti kapāṭāni kārayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:3777: ekaikaṃ ca kapāṭaṃ pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyuddhāṭayanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:3782: atha bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sārathiṃ prāha - śīghraṃ sārathe rathaṃ yojaya /
K10bsu022_u:3784: tataḥ sārathī rājānaṃ śuddhoddhanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - deva kumāra udyānabhūmimabhiniryāsyatīti //
K10bsu022_u:3785: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - na kadācinmayā kumāra udyānabhūmimabhiniṣkramitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3790: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ snehabahumānābhyāṃ bodhisattvasya nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma saptame divase kumāra udyānabhūmiṃ niṣkramiṣyatīti (subhūmidarśanāya) /
K10bsu022_u:3791: tatra bhavadbhiḥ sarvāmanāpāni cāpanayitavyāni - mā kumāraḥ pratikūlaṃ paśyet /
K10bsu022_u:3794: tataḥ saptame divase sarvaṃ nagaramalaṃkṛtamabhūt udyānabhūmimupaśobhitaṃ nānāraṅgadūṣyavitānīkṛtaṃ chatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtam /
K10bsu022_u:3796: sa mārgaḥ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭo gandhodakapariṣikto muktakusumāvakīrṇo nānāgandhaghaṭikānirdhūpitaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3799: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā nidhyāpayanti sma bodhisattvamāharitum,
K10bsu022_u:3800: tatra bodhisattvasya pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmato mahatā vyūhena
K10bsu022_u:3801: atha bodhisattvasyānubhāvena śuddhavāsakāyikairdevaputraistasmin mārge puruṣo jīrṇo
K10bsu022_u:3802: vṛddho mahallako dhamanīsaṃtatagātraḥ khaṇḍadanto valīnicitakāyaḥ palitakeśaḥ kubjo
K10bsu022_u:3803: gopānasīvakro vibhagno daṇḍaparāyaṇa āturo gatayauvanaḥ kharakharāvasaktakaṇṭhaḥ
K10bsu022_u:3804: prāgbhāreṇa kāyena daṇḍamavaṣṭabhya pravepayamānaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ purato mārgasyopadarśito 'bhūt //
K10bsu022_u:3806: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa durbala alpasthāmo ucchuṣkamāṃsarudhiratvacasnāyunaddhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3807: śvetaṃśiro viraladanta kṛśāṅgarūpo ālambya daṇḍa vrajate asukhaṃ skhalantaḥ // Lal_14.1 //
K10bsu022_u:3809: eṣo hi deva puruṣo jarayābhibhūtaḥ kṣīṇendriyaḥ sudukhito balavīryahīnaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3810: bandhūjanena paribhūta anāthabhūtaḥ kāryāsamartha apaviddhu vaneva dāru // Lal_14.2 //
K10bsu022_u:3812: kuladharma eṣa ayamasya hitaṃ bhaṇāhi athavāpi sarvajagato 'sya iyaṃ hyavasthā /
K10bsu022_u:3813: śīghraṃ bhaṇāhi vacanaṃ yathabhūtametat śrutvā tathārthamiha yoniśa cintayiṣye // Lal_14.3 //
K10bsu022_u:3815: naitasya deva kuladharma na rāṣṭradharmaḥ sarve jagasya jara yauvanu dharṣayāti /
K10bsu022_u:3816: tubhyaṃ pi mātṛpitṛbāndhavajñātisaṃgho jarayā amukta na hi anya gatirjanasya // Lal_14.4 //
K10bsu022_u:3819: dhiksārathe abudha bālajanasya buddhiḥ yadyauvanena madamatta jarāṃ na paśyet /
K10bsu022_u:3820: āvartayāśu mi rathaṃ punarahaṃ pravekṣye kiṃ mahya krīḍaratibhirjarayāśritasya // Lal_14.5 //
K10bsu022_u:3821: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratinirvatya rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāviśat //
K10bsu022_u:3822: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'pareṇa kālasamayena dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman
K10bsu022_u:3823: mahatā vyūhena so 'drākṣīnmārge puruṣaṃ vyādhispṛṣṭaṃ dagdhodarābhibhūtaṃ durbalakāyaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3826: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa ruṣyavivarṇagātraḥ sarvendriyebhi vikalo guru praśvasantaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3827: sarvāṅgaśuṣka udarākula kṛcchraprāpto mūtre purīṣi svaki tiṣṭhati kutsanīye // Lal_14.6 //
K10bsu022_u:3829: eṣo hi deva puruṣo paramaṃ gilāno vyādhībhayaṃ upagato maraṇāntaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3832: ārogyatā ca bhavate yatha svapnakrīḍā vyādhībhayaṃ ca imamīdṛśu ghorarūpam /
K10bsu022_u:3833: ko nāma vijñapuruṣo ima dṛṣṭvavasthāṃ krīḍāratiṃ ca janayecchubhasaṃjñatāṃ vā // Lal_14.8 //
K10bsu022_u:3834: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat //
K10bsu022_u:3835: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'pareṇa kālasamayena paścimena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman
K10bsu022_u:3836: mahatā vyūhena so 'drākṣīt puruṣaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagataṃ mañce samāropitaṃ cailavitānīkṛtaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3837: jñātisaṃghaparivṛtaṃ sarvai rudadbhiḥ krandadbhiḥ paridevamānaiḥ prakīrṇakeśaiḥ pāṃśvavakīrṇaśirobhirurāṃsi
K10bsu022_u:3841: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa mañcapari gṛhīto uddhūtakeśanakha pāṃśu śire kṣipanti /
K10bsu022_u:3844: eṣo hi deva puruṣo mṛtu jambudvīpe nahi bhūyu mātṛpitṛ drakṣyati putradārāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:3846: mitrajñātisaṃghaṃ paralokaprāptu na hi drakṣyati bhūyu jñātīṃ // Lal_14.10 //
K10bsu022_u:3849: dhigjīvitena viduṣā nacirasthitena dhikpaṇḍitasya puruṣasya ratiprasaṅgaiḥ // Lal_14.11 //
K10bsu022_u:3850: yadi jara na bhaveyā naiva vyādhirna mṛtyuḥ
K10bsu022_u:3854: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāvikṣat //
K10bsu022_u:3855: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyāpareṇa kālasamayenottareṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmatastaireva devaputrairbodhisattvasyānubhāvenaiva tasminmārge bhikṣurabhinirmito 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3856: adrākṣīdbodhisattvastaṃ bhikṣuṃ śāntaṃ dāntaṃ saṃyataṃ brahmacāriṇamavikṣiptacakṣuṣaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3861: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa śāntapraśāntacitto notkṣiptacakṣu vrajate yugamātradarśī /
K10bsu022_u:3862: kāṣāyavastravasano supraśāntacārī pātraṃ gṛhītva na ca uddhatu unnato vā // Lal_14.13 //
K10bsu022_u:3865: eṣo hi deva puruṣo iti bhikṣunāmā apahāya kāmaratayaḥ suvinītacārī /
K10bsu022_u:3866: pravajyaprāptu śamamātmana eṣamāṇo saṃrāgadveṣavigato 'nveti piṇḍacaryā // Lal_14.14 //
K10bsu022_u:3868: sādhū subhāṣitamidaṃ mama rocate ca pravrajya nāma vidubhiḥ satataṃ praśastā /
K10bsu022_u:3869: hitamātmanaśca parasattvahitaṃ ca yatra sukhajīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ amṛtaṃ phalaṃ ca // Lal_14.15 //
K10bsu022_u:3870: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat //
K10bsu022_u:3871: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvasyemāmevaṃrūpāṃ saṃcodanāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārthaṃ prākārān māpayate sma,
K10bsu022_u:3878: caturṣu nagaradvāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu caturo mahāsenāvyūhān sthāpayati sma bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārtham /
K10bsu022_u:3879: ya enaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ rakṣanti sma - mā bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyatīti /
K10bsu022_u:3880: antaḥpure cājñāṃ dadāti sma - mā sma kadācitsaṃgītiṃ vicchetsyatha /
K10bsu022_u:3890: nirghoṣaśca balasya tasya mahataḥ śabdo mahā śrūyate /
K10bsu022_u:3891: nagaraṃ vyākulu bhītatrastamanaso mā smād vrajetsūrato
K10bsu022_u:3892: mā bhūcchākyakuloditasya gamane chidyeta vaṃśo hyayam // Lal_14.17 //
K10bsu022_u:3893: ājñapto yuvatījanaśca satataṃ saṃgīti mā chetsyathā
K10bsu022_u:3896: ye vā istriyamāya nekavividhā darśetha ceṣṭāṃ bahuṃ
K10bsu022_u:3897: ārakṣāṃ prakarotha vighna kuruthā mā khu vrajetsūrataḥ // Lal_14.18 //
K10bsu022_u:3898: tasyā niṣkramikāli sārathivare pūrve nimittā ime
K10bsu022_u:3899: haṃsā kroñca mayūra sārika śukā no te ravaṃ muñciṣu /
K10bsu022_u:3902: puḍinīpuṣkariṇīṣu padma rucirā mlānāni mlāyanti ca
K10bsu022_u:3903: vṛkṣāḥ śuṣkapalāśa puṣparahitāḥ puṣpanti bhūyo na ca /
K10bsu022_u:3905: bherīścaiva mṛdaṅga pāṇyabhihatā bhidyanti no vādyiṣu // Lal_14.20 //
K10bsu022_u:3906: sarvaṃ vyākulamāsi tacca nagaraṃ nidrābhibhūtaṃ bhṛśaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3907: no nṛtte na ca gāyite na ramite bhūyo manaḥ kasyacit /
K10bsu022_u:3909: hā dhikśākyakulasya ṛddhi vipulā mā haiva saṃdhakṣyate // Lal_14.21 //
K10bsu022_u:3910: ekasmiṃ śayane sthite sthitamabhūdgopā tathā pārthivo
K10bsu022_u:3913: vṛkṣā mārutaeritā kṣiti patī utpāṭya mūloddhṛtāḥ // Lal_14.22 //
K10bsu022_u:3915: keśānadṛśi lūna dakṣiṇi bhuje mukuṭaṃ ca vidhvaṃsitam /
K10bsu022_u:3916: hastau chinna tathaiva chinna caraṇau nagnā dṛśī ātmanaṃ
K10bsu022_u:3917: muktāhāra tathaiva mekhalamaṇī chinnā dṛśī ātmanaḥ // Lal_14.23 //
K10bsu022_u:3918: śayanasyā dṛśi chinna pāda caturo dharaṇītalesmiṃ chayī
K10bsu022_u:3919: chatre daṇḍu sucitru śrīma ruciraṃ chinnā dṛśī pārthive /
K10bsu022_u:3920: sarve ābharaṇā vikīrṇa patitā muhyanti te vāriṇā
K10bsu022_u:3926: meruṃ parvatarājamadṛśi tadā sthānātu saṃkampitam // Lal_14.25 //
K10bsu022_u:3928: dṛṣṭvā sā pratibuddha ruṇṇanayanā svaṃ svāminaṃ abravīt /
K10bsu022_u:3929: devā kiṃ mi bhaviṣyate khalu bhaṇā supināntarāṇīdṛśā
K10bsu022_u:3930: bhrāntā me smṛti no ca paśyami punaḥ śokārditaṃ me manaḥ // Lal_14.26 //
K10bsu022_u:3932: gopāmālapate bhava pramuditā pāpaṃ na te vidyate /
K10bsu022_u:3934: ime ko 'nyaḥ paśyati naikaduḥkhavihitaḥ svapnāntarāṇīdṛśā // Lal_14.27 //
K10bsu022_u:3935: yatte dṛṣṭā medinī kampamānā kūṭā śailā medinīye patantā /
K10bsu022_u:3936: devā nāgā rākṣasā bhūtasaṃghāḥ sarve tubhyaṃ pūjyaśreṣṭhāṃ karonti // Lal_14.28 //
K10bsu022_u:3937: yatte dṛṣṭā vṛkṣamūloddhṛtāni keśāṃ lūnāṃ dakṣiṇenādṛśāsi /
K10bsu022_u:3938: kṣipraṃ gope kleśajālaṃ chinitvā dṛṣṭījālaṃ uddharī saṃskṛtātaḥ // Lal_14.29 //
K10bsu022_u:3939: yatte dṛṣṭau candrasūryau patantau dṛṣṭā nakṣatrā jyotiṣā nīpatantaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3940: kṣipraṃ gope kleśaśatrū nihatvā pūjyā loke bhāvinī tvaṃ praśasyā // Lal_14.30 //
K10bsu022_u:3941: yatte dṛṣṭā muktahāraṃ viśīrṇaṃ nagnaṃ bhagnaṃ sarvakāyādṛśāsi /
K10bsu022_u:3942: kṣipraṃ gope istrikāyaṃ jahitvā puruṣastvaṃ vai bheṣyase nocireṇa // Lal_14.31 //
K10bsu022_u:3943: yatte dṛṣṭaṃ mañcakaṃ chinnapādaṃ chatre daṇḍaṃ ratnacitraṃ prabhagnam /
K10bsu022_u:3944: kṣipraṃ gope ogha catvāri tīrtvā māṃ draṣṭāsī ekachatraṃ triloke // Lal_14.32 //
K10bsu022_u:3946: yatte dṛṣṭā bhūṣaṇā uhyamānā cūḍā vastrā mahya mañce 'dṛśāsi /
K10bsu022_u:3947: kṣipraṃ gope lakṣaṇairbhūṣitāṅgaṃ māṃ saṃpaśyī sarvalokaiḥ stuvantam // Lal_14.33 //
K10bsu022_u:3948: yatte dṛṣṭā dīpakoṭīśatāni nagarānniṣkrāntā tatpuraṃ cāndhakāram /
K10bsu022_u:3949: kṣipraṃ gope mohavidyāndhakāre prajñāloke kurvamī sarvalokam // Lal_14.34 //
K10bsu022_u:3950: yatte dṛṣṭaṃ muktahāraṃ prabhagnaṃ chinnaṃ caiva svarṇasūtraṃ vicitram /
K10bsu022_u:3951: kṣipraṃ gope kleśajālaṃ chinitvā saṃjñā sūtraṃ uddharī saṃskṛtātaḥ // Lal_14.35 //
K10bsu022_u:3952: yatte gope cittikāraṃ karoṣī nityaṃ pūjāṃ gauraveṇottamena /
K10bsu022_u:3953: nāstī tubhyaṃ durgatī naiva śokaḥ kṣipraṃ bhohī prītiprāmodyalabdhā // Lal_14.36 //
K10bsu022_u:3954: pūrve mahyaṃ dānu dattaṃ praṇītaṃ śīlaṃ cīrṇaṃ bhāvitā nityakṣānti /
K10bsu022_u:3955: tasmānmahyaṃ ye prasādaṃ labhante sarve bhontī prītiprāmodyalābhāḥ // Lal_14.37 //
K10bsu022_u:3956: kalpā koṭī saṃskṛtā me anantā bodhīmārgo śodhito me praṇītaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3957: tasmānmahyaṃ ye prasādaṃ karonti sarve chinnā teṣu trīṇyapyapāyāḥ // Lal_14.38 //
K10bsu022_u:3958: harṣaṃ vindā mā ca khedaṃ janehi tuṣṭiṃ vindā saṃjanehī ca prītim /
K10bsu022_u:3959: kṣipraṃ bheṣye prītiprāmodyalābhī sehī gope bhadrakā te nimittā // Lal_14.39 //
K10bsu022_u:3960: so puṇyatejabharito siritejagarbho pūrve nimittasupine imi adṛśāsi /
K10bsu022_u:3962: ye bhonti pūrvaśubhakarmasamuccayānāṃ naiṣkramyakālasamaye narapuṃgavānām // Lal_14.40 //
K10bsu022_u:3963: so adṛśāsi ca karāccaraṇāddhatānā mahasāgarebhi catubhirjala lolayantā /
K10bsu022_u:3964: sarvāmimāṃ vasumatīṃ śayanaṃ vicitraṃ meruṃ ca parvatavaraṃ śirasopadhānam // Lal_14.41 //
K10bsu022_u:3965: ābhā pramukta supine tada adṛśāsi loke vilokitu mahātamasāndhakāram /
K10bsu022_u:3966: chatrodgataṃ dharaṇiye spharate trilokaṃ ābhāya spṛṣṭa vinipātadukhā praśāntā // Lal_14.42 //
K10bsu022_u:3967: kṛṣṇā śubhā caturi prāṇaka pāda lekhī catuvarṇa etva śakunādbhuta ekavarṇāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3968: mīḍhaṃgirī paramahīna jugupsanīyā abhibhūya caṃkramati tatra ca nopalipto // Lal_14.43 //
K10bsu022_u:3969: bhūyo 'dṛśī supini nadya jalaprapūrṇā bahusattvakoṭinayutāni ca uhyamānā /
K10bsu022_u:3970: so nāva kṛtva prataritva parāṃ pratārya sthāpeti so sthalavare abhaye aśoke // Lal_14.44 //
K10bsu022_u:3971: bhūyo 'dṛśāti bahu ātura rogaspṛṣṭāṃ ārogyatejarahitāṃ balaviprahīnāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:3972: so vaidya bhūtva bahu oṣadha saṃprayacchā moceti sattvanayutāṃ bahurogaspṛṣṭāṃ // Lal_14.45 //
K10bsu022_u:3973: siṃhāsane va hi niṣaṇṇa sumerupṛṣṭhe śiṣyāṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭānamarānnamantāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:3974: saṃgrāmamadhyi jayu adṛśi ātmanaśca ānandaśabdamamarāṃ gagane bruvantaḥ // Lal_14.46 //
K10bsu022_u:3975: evaṃvidhā supini adṛśi bodhisattvo maṅgalya śobhanavratasya ca pāripūrim /
K10bsu022_u:3976: yāṃ śrutva devamanujā abhavanprahṛṣṭā na cirādbhaviṣyati ayaṃ naradevadevaḥ // Lal_14.47 //
K10bsu022_u:3982: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ayuktametanmama syādakṛtajñatā ca yadahamaprativedya mahārājñaḥ śuddhodanasya ananujñātaśca pitrā niṣkrameyam /
K10bsu022_u:3983: sa rātrau praśāntāyāṃ svakādupasthānaprāsādādavatīrya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya prāsādatale pratiṣṭhito 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3984: pratiṣṭhitamātrasya ca punarbodhisattvasya sarvo 'sau prāsāda ābhayā sphuṭo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:3986: dṛṣṭvā ca punastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukiyamāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ bhoḥ kāñcukīya sūryo 'bhyudgato yeneyaṃ prabhā virājate?
K10bsu022_u:3987: kāñcukīya āha - adyāpi tāvadeva rajanyā upārdhaṃ nātikrāntam / api ca deva -
K10bsu022_u:3988: sūryaprabhāya bhavate drumakuḍyachāyā saṃtāpayāti ca tanuṃ prakaroti dharmam /
K10bsu022_u:3989: haṃsā mayūraśukakokilacakravākāḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye svarutāṃ ravanti // Lal_15.1 //
K10bsu022_u:3990: ābhā iyaṃ tu naradeva sukhā manojñā prahlādanī śubhakarī na karoti dāham /
K10bsu022_u:3991: kuḍyā ca vṛkṣa abhibhūya na cāsti chāyā niḥsaṃśayaṃ guṇadharo iha adya prāptaḥ // Lal_15.2 //
K10bsu022_u:3992: so prekṣate daśadiśo nṛpatī viṣaṇṇo dṛṣṭaśca so kamalalocana śuddhasattvaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:3993: so 'bhyutthituṃ śayani icchati na prabhoti pitṛgauravaṃ janayate varaśuddhabuddhiḥ // Lal_15.3 //
K10bsu022_u:3994: so ca sthihitva purato nṛpatiṃ avocat mā bhūyu vighna prakarohi ma caiva khedam /
K10bsu022_u:3995: naiṣkramyakālasamayo mama deva yukto hanta kṣamasva nṛpate sajanaḥ sarāṣṭraḥ // Lal_15.4 //
K10bsu022_u:3996: taṃ aśrupūrṇanayano nṛpatī babhāṣe kiṃcitprayojanu bhavedvinivartane te /
K10bsu022_u:3997: kiṃ yācase mama varaṃ vada sarva dāsye anugṛhṇa rājakulu māṃ ca idaṃ ca rāṣṭram // Lal_15.5 //
K10bsu022_u:3999: tada bodhisattva avacī madhurapralāpī icchāmi deva caturo vara tān mi dehi /
K10bsu022_u:4000: yadi śakyase daditu mahya vase ti tatra tad drakṣyase sada gṛhe na ca niṣkramiṣye // Lal_15.6 //
K10bsu022_u:4001: icchāmi deva jara mahya na ākrameyyā
K10bsu022_u:4003: ārogyaprāptu bhavi no ca bhaveta vyādhiḥ
K10bsu022_u:4004: amitāyuṣaśca bhavi no ca bhaveta mṛtyuḥ (saṃpattitaśca vipulā nu bhavedvipattiḥ) // Lal_15.7 //
K10bsu022_u:4005: rājā śruṇitva vacanaṃ paramaṃ dukhārto asthānu yācasi kumāra na me 'tra śaktiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4006: jaravyādhimṛtyubhayataśca vipattitaśca kalpasthitīya ṛṣayo 'pi na jātu muktāḥ // Lal_15.8 //
K10bsu022_u:4007: yadidāni deva caturo vara no dadāsi jaravyādhimṛtyubhayataśca vipattitaśca /
K10bsu022_u:4008: hanta śṛṇuṣva nṛpate aparaṃ varaikaṃ asmāccyutasya pratisaṃdhi na me bhaveyā // Lal_15.9 //
K10bsu022_u:4009: śrutvaiva cema vacanaṃ narapuṃgavasya tṛṣṇā tanuṃ ca kari chindati putrasneham /
K10bsu022_u:4010: anumodamī hitakarā jagati pramokṣaṃ abhiprāyu tubhya paripūryatu yanmataṃ te // Lal_15.10 //
K10bsu022_u:4011: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratikramya svake prāsāde 'bhiruhya śayane niṣasāda /
K10bsu022_u:4012: na cāsya kaścidgamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma //
K10bsu022_u:4013: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodanastasyā rātryā atyayena sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma - abhiniṣkramiṣyati kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4016: tatkasmāt? ayaṃ ca mahāñśākyagaṇaḥ, sa caikākī /
K10bsu022_u:4018: tatra taiḥ śākyai rājñā śuddhodanena ca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni
K10bsu022_u:4019: iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni pūrve nagaradvāre sthāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvasya rakṣaṇārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4023: evaṃ dakṣiṇe paścime uttare nagaradvāre pañca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni /
K10bsu022_u:4025: ekaikaṃ ca rathaṃ pañcapattiśataparivāraṃ sthāpitamabhūta bodhisattvasya rakṣārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4027: rājā ca śuddhodanaḥ pañcabhiḥ śākyakumāraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svake gṛhadvāre hayeṣu ca gajeṣu ca samabhiruhya jāgarti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4029: jvāletha dīpa vimalāṃ dhvajāgri maṇiratna sarvi sthāpethā /
K10bsu022_u:4030: olambayātha hārāṃ prabhāṃ kuruta sarvi gehesmin // Lal_15.11 //
K10bsu022_u:4031: saṃgīti yojayethā jāgaratha atandritā imāṃ rajanīm /
K10bsu022_u:4032: pratirakṣathā kumāraṃ yathā avidito na gaccheyā // Lal_15.12 //
K10bsu022_u:4035: dvārāṃ pithetha sarvāṃ suyantritāṃ nirgaḍāṃ dṛḍhakapāṭāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:4036: muñcatha mā ca akāle mā agrasattva itu na vrajeyā // Lal_15.14 //
K10bsu022_u:4040: tatha tatha parākramathā yathā vighātaṃ na vindeyā // Lal_15.16 //
K10bsu022_u:4041: yā nāri śaktidhārī śayanaṃ parivārayantu vimalasya /
K10bsu022_u:4042: ma ca bhavatha middhavihatāḥ pataṃga iva rakṣathā netraiḥ // Lal_15.17 //
K10bsu022_u:4043: chādetha ratanajālai idaṃ gṛhaṃ pārthivasya rakṣārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4044: veṇūravāṃśca ravathā imāṃ rajani rakṣathā virajām // Lal_15.18 //
K10bsu022_u:4045: anyonya bodhayethā ma vasayathā rakṣathā imāṃ rajanīm /
K10bsu022_u:4046: mā hu abhiniṣkramethā vijahya rāṣṭraṃ ca rājyaṃ ca // Lal_15.19 //
K10bsu022_u:4050: ca pañcahāritīputraśatānyekasmin saṃnipātyaivaṃ mataṃ vicārayanti sma - adya mārṣā
K10bsu022_u:4054: catvāraśca mahārājāno alakavatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya tāṃ mahatīṃ yakṣaparṣadamāmantrayate sma - adya mārṣā bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati /
K10bsu022_u:4057: vajradṛḍha abhedya nārāyaṇo ātmabhāvo guru vīryabalaupetu so 'kampito sarvasattvottamaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4058: girivara mahameru utpāṭya śakyaṃ nabhe dhārituṃ kenacit na tu jinaguṇameru śailairguruḥ puṇyajñānāśritaḥ śakya netuṃ kvacit // Lal_15.21 //

K10bsu022_u:4357: āgatya ca kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva paścimāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:4361: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata evottarāṃ diśamupaniśrityāsthāt bodhisattvaṃ namasyamānaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:4363: āgatya kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathāgata eva saparivāra uparyantarikṣe 'sthāt bodhisattvaṃ namaskurvan //
K10bsu022_u:4364: iti hi bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutyāśrupūrṇanayano bodhisattvamevamāha - āryaputra tvaṃ ca kālajño velajñaśca samayajñaḥ
K10bsu022_u:4371: yattanmayā prārthitu dīrgharātraṃ sattvānamarthaṃ parimārgatā hi /
K10bsu022_u:4372: avāpya bodhiṃ ajarāmaraṃ padaṃ moce jagattasya kṣaṇo upasthitaḥ // Lal_15.60 //
K10bsu022_u:4376: bhaumāntarīkṣāśca tathaiva pālāḥ śakraśca devādhipatiḥ sayakṣaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4377: yāmāśca devāstuṣitāśca nirmitāḥ paranirmitodyukta tathaiva devāḥ // Lal_15.61 //
K10bsu022_u:4378: varuṇo manasvī api nāgarājā anāvataptaśca tathaiva māgaraḥ
K10bsu022_u:4379: abhiyukta te cāpyabhipūjanārthaṃ naiṣkramyakāle narapuṃgavasya // Lal_15.62 //
K10bsu022_u:4380: ye cāpi rūpāvacareṣu devāḥ praśāntacārī saha dhyānagocarāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4381: abhiyukta te cāpyabhipūjanārthaṃ trailokyapūjyasya narottamasya // Lal_15.63 //
K10bsu022_u:4383: drakṣyāmahe niṣkramaṇaṃ jinasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi tathānurūpām // Lal_15.64 //
K10bsu022_u:4384: sa cāpi guhyādhipatirmahātmā pradīptavajro nabhasi pratisthitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4385: saṃnaddhagātro balavīryavikramaḥ kareṇa guhya jvalamānu vajram // Lal_15.65 //
K10bsu022_u:4386: candraśca sūryo ubhi devaputrau pradakṣiṇaṃ vāmaku supratisthitau /
K10bsu022_u:4388: puṣyaśca nakṣatra sapāriṣadyo audārikaṃ nirmiṇi ātmabhāvam /
K10bsu022_u:4390: sarve 'dya siddhāḥ śubha tubhya maṅgalāḥ puṣyaśca yuktaḥ samayaśca gantum /
K10bsu022_u:4397: sa cāpi paryaṅkavare niṣaṇṇo devairvṛto bhrājati dīptatejaḥ // Lal_15.70 //
K10bsu022_u:4398: nagare istrika dārakāśca puruṣā yāścābhavan dārikāḥ
K10bsu022_u:4401: sarve te śayitā kilāntamanasaḥ paśyanti rūpaṃ na te // Lal_15.71 //
K10bsu022_u:4402: ye cā te dṛḍhavajratomaradharā śākyaiḥ sutāḥ sthāpitāḥ
K10bsu022_u:4404: rājā rājakumāra pārthivajanaḥ sarve prasuptā bhavan
K10bsu022_u:4405: api cā nārigaṇā vinagnavasanā suptā na te buddhiṣū // Lal_15.72 //
K10bsu022_u:4407: rātrau nirgata ardharātrasamaye taṃ chandakaṃ abravīt /
K10bsu022_u:4408: sādhū chandaka dehi kaṇṭhaku mama svālaṃkṛtaṃ śobhanaṃ
K10bsu022_u:4409: mā vighnaṃ kuru me dadāhi capalaṃ yadi me priyaṃ manyase // Lal_15.73 //
K10bsu022_u:4410: kva tvaṃ yāsyasi sattvasārathivarā kiṃ aśvakāryaṃ ca te
K10bsu022_u:4411: kālajñaḥ samayajña dharmacaraṇo kālo na gantu kvacit /
K10bsu022_u:4412: dvārāste pithitā dṛḍhārgalakṛtā ko dāsyate tāṃ tava /
K10bsu022_u:4413: śakreṇā manasātha cetanavaśātte dvāra muktā kṛtāḥ
K10bsu022_u:4414: dṛṣṭvā chandaka harṣito puna dukhī aśrūṇi so 'vartayī /
K10bsu022_u:4415: hā dhikko mi sahāyu kiṃ tu kurumī dhāvāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ
K10bsu022_u:4416: ugraṃtejadhareṇa vākyu bhaṇitaṃ śakyaṃ na saṃdhāritum // Lal_15.74 //
K10bsu022_u:4418: sā senā caturaṅginī balavatī kiṃ bhū karotīha hā
K10bsu022_u:4419: rājā rājakumāra pārthiva jano nemaṃ hi budhyanti te /
K10bsu022_u:4421: hā dhiggacchati sidhyate 'sya praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ // Lal_15.75 //
K10bsu022_u:4423: sādhu chandaka dehi kaṇṭhakavaraṃ mā khedayī nāyakam /
K10bsu022_u:4425: naivedaṃ pratibudhyate puravaraṃ osvāpitaṃ devataiḥ // Lal_15.76 //
K10bsu022_u:4426: paśya chandaka antarīkṣa vimalaṃ divyā prabhā śobhate
K10bsu022_u:4428: śakraṃ paśya śacīpatiṃ balavṛtaṃ dvārasthitaṃ bhrājate
K10bsu022_u:4430: śrutvā chandaka devatāna vacanaṃ taṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ ālapī
K10bsu022_u:4432: so taṃ varṣikuvarṇa kāñcanakhuraṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvanā
K10bsu022_u:4433: upanetī guṇasāgarasya vahanaṃ rodantako durmanā // Lal_15.78 //
K10bsu022_u:4434: eṣā te varalakṣaṇā hitakarā aśvaḥ sujātaḥ śubho
K10bsu022_u:4435: gaccha sidhyatu tubhya eva praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4436: ye te vighnakarā vrajantu praśamaṃ āsāṃ vrataṃ sidhyatāṃ
K10bsu022_u:4437: bhavahī sarvajagasya saukhyadadanaḥ svargasya śāntyāstathā // Lal_15.79 //
K10bsu022_u:4438: sarvā kampita ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī śayanādyadā sotthitaḥ
K10bsu022_u:4441: śakro brahma ubhau ca tasya purato darśyanti mārgo hyayam // Lal_15.80 //
K10bsu022_u:4442: ābhā tena pramukta acchavimalā obhāsitā medinī
K10bsu022_u:4443: sarve śānta apāya sattva sukhitā kleśairna bādhyī tadā /
K10bsu022_u:4445: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ puravaraṃ gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ // Lal_15.81 //
K10bsu022_u:4447: puravarottami devata dīnamanā upagamya gacchati mahāpuruṣe /
K10bsu022_u:4448: purataḥ sthitā karuṇadīnamanā girayā samālapati padmamukham // Lal_15.82 //
K10bsu022_u:4449: tamasākulaṃ bhuvimu sarvapuraṃ nagaraṃ na śobhati tvaya rahitam /
K10bsu022_u:4450: na mamātra kāci rati prītikarī tyaktaṃ tvayā ca yadidaṃ bhavanam // Lal_15.83 //
K10bsu022_u:4451: na punaḥ śruṇiṣyi rutu pakṣigaṇe antaḥpure madhuraveṇuravam /
K10bsu022_u:4452: maṅgalyaśabda tatha gītaravaṃ pratibodhanaṃ tava anantayaśaḥ // Lal_15.84 //
K10bsu022_u:4453: darśe na bhūyu surasiddhagaṇāṃ kurvantu pūja tava rātridivam /
K10bsu022_u:4454: ghrāyiṣyi gandha na ca divya punaḥ tvayi nirgate nihatakleśagaṇe // Lal_15.85 //
K10bsu022_u:4455: nirbhuktamālyamiva paryuṣitaṃ tyaktaṃ tvayādya bhavanaṃ hi tathā /
K10bsu022_u:4456: naṭaraṅgakalpa pratibhāyati me tvayi nirgate na bhuyu tejaśiri // Lal_15.86 //
K10bsu022_u:4457: ojo balaṃ harasi sarvapure na ca śobhate aṭavitulyamidam /
K10bsu022_u:4458: vitathaṃ ṛṣīṇa vacanādya bhutaṃ yehī viyākṛtu bhuvi cakrabalo // Lal_15.87 //
K10bsu022_u:4459: abalaṃ balaṃ bhuvimu śākyabalaṃ ucchinna vaṃśa iha rājakule /
K10bsu022_u:4460: āśā pranaṣṭa iha śākyagaṇe tvayi nirgate mahati puṇyadrume // Lal_15.88 //
K10bsu022_u:4461: ahameva tubhya gati gacchayamī yatha tvaṃ prayāsi amalā vimalā /
K10bsu022_u:4463: api cā kṛpā karuṇa saṃjaniya vyavalokayasva bhavanaṃ tvamidam // Lal_15.89 //
K10bsu022_u:4464: vyavalokya caiva bhavanaṃ matimān madhurasvaro giramudīritavān /
K10bsu022_u:4465: nāhaṃ pravekṣi kapilasya puraṃ aprāpya jātimaraṇāntakaram // Lal_15.90 //
K10bsu022_u:4467: yāvanna labdha varabodhi mayā ajarāmaraṃ padavaraṃ hyamṛtam // Lal_15.91 //
K10bsu022_u:4468: yadasau jagatpradhāno niṣkrāntu bodhisattvo tasyā nabhe vrajanto stavayiṃsu apsarāṇām /
K10bsu022_u:4469: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ puṇyarthikāna kṣetraṃ amṛtāphalasya dātā // Lal_15.92 //
K10bsu022_u:4470: ena bahukalpakoṭī dānadamasaṃyamenā samudānitāsya bodhiḥ sattvakaruṇāyamānā /
K10bsu022_u:4471: eṣa pariśuddhaśīlo suvrata akhaṇḍacārī na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī // Lal_15.93 //
K10bsu022_u:4472: eṣa sada kṣāntivādī chidyanti aṅgamaṅge na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4473: eṣa sada vīryavanto avikhinna kalpakoṭyaḥ samudānitāsya bodhiryaṣṭā ca yakṣakoṭīḥ // Lal_15.94 //
K10bsu022_u:4474: eṣa sada dhyānadhyāyī śāntapraśāntacitto dhyāyitva sarvakleśāṃ moceṣyi sattvakoṭīḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4475: eṣo asaṅga prājñaḥ kalpairvikalpamukto kalpairvimuktacitto jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ // Lal_15.95 //
K10bsu022_u:4476: eṣa sada maitracitto karuṇāya pāraprāpto mudito upekṣadhyāyī brāhme pathi vidhijñaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4477: eṣo 'tidevadevo devebhi pūjanīyo śubhavimalaśuddhacitto guṇaniyutapāraprāptaḥ // Lal_15.96 //
K10bsu022_u:4479: śaraṇaṃ bhayārditānāṃ dīpo acakṣuṣāṇāṃ layano upadrutānāṃ vaidyaścirāturāṇām /
K10bsu022_u:4480: rājeva dharmarājo indraḥ sahasranetro brahmasvayaṃbhubhūtaḥ kāyapraśabdhacitto // Lal_15.97 //
K10bsu022_u:4481: dhīraḥ prabhūtaprajño vīro viviktacittaḥ śūraḥ kileśaghātī ajitaṃjayo jitāriḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4482: siṃho bhayaprahīṇo nāgaḥ sudāntacitto ṛṣabho gaṇapradhānaḥ kṣāntaḥ prahīṇakopaḥ // Lal_15.98 //
K10bsu022_u:4488: ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro ena jitu mṛtyumāro nihato 'sya deva(putra)māro /
K10bsu022_u:4489: eṣa maha sārthavāho kupathapratisthitānāṃ aṣṭāṅgamārgaśreṣṭhaṃ deśeṣyate nacireṇā // Lal_15.100 //
K10bsu022_u:4491: bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4493: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ // Lal_15.101 //
K10bsu022_u:4494: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
K10bsu022_u:4496: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4497: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti //
K10bsu022_u:4500: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:4503: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti /
K10bsu022_u:4504: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4505: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4506: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
K10bsu022_u:4509: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi /
K10bsu022_u:4513: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
K10bsu022_u:4514: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
K10bsu022_u:4519: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:4521: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
K10bsu022_u:4525: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
K10bsu022_u:4526: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ
K10bsu022_u:4531: pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme 'bhaye 'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase 'mṛte dharmadhātau
K10bsu022_u:4534: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:4536: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4557: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4559: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4560: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma //
K10bsu022_u:4561: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate?
K10bsu022_u:4562: śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate /
K10bsu022_u:4567: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
K10bsu022_u:4568: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti //
K10bsu022_u:4573: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
K10bsu022_u:4575: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
K10bsu022_u:4577: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
K10bsu022_u:4581: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
K10bsu022_u:4584: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka,
K10bsu022_u:4585: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
K10bsu022_u:4587: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
K10bsu022_u:4589: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham //
K10bsu022_u:4590: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam?
K10bsu022_u:4594: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
K10bsu022_u:4599: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno 'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma /
K10bsu022_u:4602: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
K10bsu022_u:4603: tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi,
K10bsu022_u:4606: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4609: niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
K10bsu022_u:4610: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante // Lal_15.102 //
K10bsu022_u:4611: gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
K10bsu022_u:4612: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo // Lal_15.103 //
K10bsu022_u:4613: rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
K10bsu022_u:4614: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām // Lal_15.104 //
K10bsu022_u:4615: gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
K10bsu022_u:4616: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ // Lal_15.105 //
K10bsu022_u:4617: rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
K10bsu022_u:4618: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā // Lal_15.106 //
K10bsu022_u:4619: na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye /
K10bsu022_u:4620: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam // Lal_15.107 //
K10bsu022_u:4622: udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4623: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena // Lal_15.108 //
K10bsu022_u:4624: hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4625: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā // Lal_15.109 //
K10bsu022_u:4626: mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
K10bsu022_u:4627: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam // Lal_15.110 //
K10bsu022_u:4628: so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
K10bsu022_u:4629: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi // Lal_15.111 //
K10bsu022_u:4630: mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
K10bsu022_u:4631: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ // Lal_15.112 //
K10bsu022_u:4632: chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
K10bsu022_u:4633: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo // Lal_15.113 //
K10bsu022_u:4634: mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4635: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante // Lal_15.114 //
K10bsu022_u:4636: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
K10bsu022_u:4638: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām // Lal_15.115 //
K10bsu022_u:4639: ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
K10bsu022_u:4640: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto // Lal_15.116 //
K10bsu022_u:4641: gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
K10bsu022_u:4642: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā // Lal_15.117 //
K10bsu022_u:4643: dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
K10bsu022_u:4644: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam // Lal_15.118 //
K10bsu022_u:4645: sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4646: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ // Lal_15.119 //
K10bsu022_u:4647: chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe /
K10bsu022_u:4648: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam // Lal_15.120 //
K10bsu022_u:4649: so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
K10bsu022_u:4650: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam // Lal_15.121 //
K10bsu022_u:4651: śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4652: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto // Lal_15.122 //
K10bsu022_u:4654: ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
K10bsu022_u:4655: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ // Lal_15.123 //
K10bsu022_u:4656: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
K10bsu022_u:4657: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā // Lal_15.124 //
K10bsu022_u:4658: udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
K10bsu022_u:4659: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo // Lal_15.125 //
K10bsu022_u:4660: sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
K10bsu022_u:4661: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā // Lal_15.126 //
K10bsu022_u:4662: hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
K10bsu022_u:4663: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā // Lal_15.127 //
K10bsu022_u:4664: hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
K10bsu022_u:4665: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā // Lal_15.128 //
K10bsu022_u:4667: hā mama sumāñjaghoṣā kalaviṅkarutasvarā madhurabrahmarutā // Lal_15.129 //
K10bsu022_u:4669: hā mama anantavarṇā guṇagaṇapratimaṇḍitā ṛṣigaṇaprītikarā // Lal_15.130 //
K10bsu022_u:4670: hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
K10bsu022_u:4671: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā // Lal_15.131 //
K10bsu022_u:4672: hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
K10bsu022_u:4674: hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
K10bsu022_u:4675: hā mama suvṛttaskandhā cāpodara eṇeyajaṅghavṛttakaṭī // Lal_15.133 //
K10bsu022_u:4678: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā // Lal_15.134 //
K10bsu022_u:4680: hā mahya puṣpagandhā antaḥpuri gītavāditairharṣakarā // Lal_15.135 //
K10bsu022_u:4681: hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
K10bsu022_u:4682: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe // Lal_15.136 //
K10bsu022_u:4683: gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
K10bsu022_u:4684: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ // Lal_15.137 //
K10bsu022_u:4685: katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
K10bsu022_u:4686: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī // Lal_15.138 //
K10bsu022_u:4687: atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
K10bsu022_u:4689: tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /
K10bsu022_u:4690: hā dhik priyairviyogo naṭaraṅgasvabhāvasaṃnibhā anityā // Lal_15.140 //
K10bsu022_u:4692: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā // Lal_15.141 //
K10bsu022_u:4694: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin // Lal_15.142 //
K10bsu022_u:4696: sāśrukaṇṭha gira saṃprabhāṣate sādhu gopi niśṛṇohi me vacaḥ // Lal_15.143 //
K10bsu022_u:4697: rātriye rahasi yāmi madhyame sarvanārigaṇi saṃprasuptake /
K10bsu022_u:4698: so tadā ca śatapuṇyaudgato ālapeti mama dehi kaṇṭhakam // Lal_15.144 //
K10bsu022_u:4699: taṃ niśāmya vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ tubhya prekṣami śayāni suptikām /
K10bsu022_u:4700: uccaghoṣu ahu tatra muñcamī utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo // Lal_15.145 //
K10bsu022_u:4702: devatā vacanu taṃ nirodhayi eka istri napi kāci budhyate /
K10bsu022_u:4703: rodamāna samalaṃkaritvanā aśvarāju dadamī narottame // Lal_15.146 //
K10bsu022_u:4704: kaṇṭhako hiṣati ugratejasvī krośamātru svaru tasya gacchatī /
K10bsu022_u:4705: no ca kaści śṛṇute purottame devatābhi osvāpanaṃ kṛtam // Lal_15.147 //
K10bsu022_u:4707: sā raṇī madhurabhīṣmaśobhanā no ca keci śṛṇuvanti mānuṣāḥ // Lal_15.148 //
K10bsu022_u:4708: puṣyayuktu abhu tasmi antare candrajyotiṣa nabhe pratisthitā /
K10bsu022_u:4709: devakoṭi gagane kṛtāñjalī onamanti śirasābhivandiṣū // Lal_15.149 //
K10bsu022_u:4711: kaṇṭhakasya caraṇāṃ kare nyasī padmakeśaraviśuddhanirmalam // Lal_15.150 //
K10bsu022_u:4713: ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī prakampitā buddhakṣetra sphuṭa ābhanirmalā // Lal_15.151 //
K10bsu022_u:4714: śakra devaguruḥ śacīpatiḥ svāma dvāra vivarī tadantare /
K10bsu022_u:4715: devakoṭinayutaiḥ puraskṛto so vrajī amaranāgapūjito // Lal_15.152 //
K10bsu022_u:4716: saṃjñamātra iha jāti kaṇṭhako lokanāthu vahatī nabho 'ntare /
K10bsu022_u:4718: devadānavagaṇā saindrikāḥ ye vahanti sugatasya gacchataḥ // Lal_15.153 //
K10bsu022_u:4720: kaṇṭhakasya balu te dadantikāḥ muñci ghoṣu madhuraṃ manoramam // Lal_15.154 //
K10bsu022_u:4721: kaṇṭhakā vahahi lokanāyakaṃ śīghra śīghra ma janehi khedatām /
K10bsu022_u:4723: ekameka abhinandate suro vāhanaṃ smi ahu lokanāyake /
K10bsu022_u:4724: no ca kiṃcidapi deśu vidyate devakoṭicaraṇairna marditam // Lal_15.156 //
K10bsu022_u:4725: paśya kaṇṭhaka nabhontare imaṃ mārgu saṃsthitu vicitraśobhanam /
K10bsu022_u:4727: ena kaṇṭhaka śubhena karmaṇā trāyatriṃśabhavane sunirmito /
K10bsu022_u:4728: apsarai parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto divyakāmaratibhī ramiṣyase // Lal_15.158 //
K10bsu022_u:4729: sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī tuṣṭa bhohi paramapraharṣitā /
K10bsu022_u:4730: drakṣase nacirato narottamaṃ bodhiprāptamamaraiḥ puraskṛtam // Lal_15.159 //
K10bsu022_u:4731: ye narāḥ sukṛtakarmakārakāḥ te na gopi sada roditavyakāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4732: so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato harṣitavya na sa roditavyakaḥ // Lal_15.160 //
K10bsu022_u:4734: saptarātra bhaṇabhānu gopike sā viyūha napi śakya kṣepitum /
K10bsu022_u:4735: yā viyūha abhu tatra pārthive niṣkramanti naradevapūjite // Lal_15.161 //
K10bsu022_u:4736: lābha tubhya paramā acintiyā yaṃ tyupasthitu jage hitaṃkaro /
K10bsu022_u:4737: mahya saṃjñi svakameva vartate tvaṃ hi bheṣyasi yathā narottamaḥ // Lal_15.162 //
K10bsu022_u:4743: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt //
K10bsu022_u:4744: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya
K10bsu022_u:4745: sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai
K10bsu022_u:4747: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:4748: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma /
K10bsu022_u:4749: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4754: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto 'bhut //
K10bsu022_u:4755: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4756: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4757: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma - paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti /
K10bsu022_u:4760: tato 'haṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat - careyamahaṃ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam /
K10bsu022_u:4761: so 'vocat - cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro 'lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati //
K10bsu022_u:4762: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - asti me chando 'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā,
K10bsu022_u:4763: yannvahameko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai //
K10bsu022_u:4764: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam //
K10bsu022_u:4765: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat - etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo 'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ?
K10bsu022_u:4767: tamahamavocat - mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'dhigataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4768: so 'vocat - tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
K10bsu022_u:4773: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4774: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:4776: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,
K10bsu022_u:4779: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:4780: so 'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūvam /
K10bsu022_u:4782: tato 'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
K10bsu022_u:4783: piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena
K10bsu022_u:4786: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan - kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam
K10bsu022_u:4788: atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4789: śāntamanu dānta īryavanto viharati pāṇḍavaśailarājapārśve // Lal_16.1 //
K10bsu022_u:4790: rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṃ nivāsayitvā /
K10bsu022_u:4791: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṃ sapiṇḍapātram // Lal_16.2 //
K10bsu022_u:4793: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena // Lal_16.3 //
K10bsu022_u:4794: vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato 'sya /
K10bsu022_u:4795: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṃ vibhāti sarvam // Lal_16.4 //
K10bsu022_u:4796: upari sthihiya nāriṇāṃ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne /
K10bsu022_u:4798: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ // Lal_16.5 //
K10bsu022_u:4799: na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṃ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam /
K10bsu022_u:4800: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam // Lal_16.6 //
K10bsu022_u:4801: puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṃ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo /
K10bsu022_u:4802: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam // Lal_16.7 //
K10bsu022_u:4803: keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4804: tatha api saṃtuṣitaṃ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ // Lal_16.8 //
K10bsu022_u:4805: keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī /
K10bsu022_u:4806: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṃ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī // Lal_16.9 //
K10bsu022_u:4807: vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo 'sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe /
K10bsu022_u:4808: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṃ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṃ vā // Lal_16.10 //
K10bsu022_u:4809: piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī /
K10bsu022_u:4810: dṛṣṭva girivaraṃ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam // Lal_16.11 //
K10bsu022_u:4811: rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4812: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam // Lal_16.12 //
K10bsu022_u:4814: dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam /
K10bsu022_u:4815: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena // Lal_16.13 //
K10bsu022_u:4816: śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṃ samudāharitva vocat /
K10bsu022_u:4817: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṃ ca piṇḍam // Lal_16.14 //
K10bsu022_u:4818: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva /
K10bsu022_u:4819: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṃ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ // Lal_16.15 //
K10bsu022_u:4821: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṃghaṃ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.16 //
K10bsu022_u:4822: paramapramudito 'smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam /
K10bsu022_u:4823: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṃ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.17 //
K10bsu022_u:4824: mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam /
K10bsu022_u:4825: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ // Lal_16.18 //
K10bsu022_u:4826: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī /
K10bsu022_u:4827: svasti dharaṇipāla te 'stu nityaṃ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko 'smi // Lal_16.19 //
K10bsu022_u:4829: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam // Lal_16.20 //
K10bsu022_u:4831: kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti /
K10bsu022_u:4832: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṃ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā // Lal_16.21 //
K10bsu022_u:4833: kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī /
K10bsu022_u:4834: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ // Lal_16.22 //
K10bsu022_u:4835: kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā /
K10bsu022_u:4836: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṃ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan // Lal_16.23 //
K10bsu022_u:4837: ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṃjñā /
K10bsu022_u:4838: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ // Lal_16.24 //
K10bsu022_u:4839: kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṃskṛtasya /
K10bsu022_u:4840: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne // Lal_16.25 //
K10bsu022_u:4841: api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṃ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat /
K10bsu022_u:4842: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṃ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ // Lal_16.26 //
K10bsu022_u:4843: ahamapi vipulāṃ vijahya kāmāṃ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:4844: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato 'haṃ paramaśivāṃ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ // Lal_16.27 //
K10bsu022_u:4846: katama diśi kuto gato 'si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā /
K10bsu022_u:4848: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo 'tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṃjñā // Lal_16.28 //
K10bsu022_u:4850: śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṃ kapilapuraṃ paramaṃ suṛddhisphītam /
K10bsu022_u:4851: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī // Lal_16.29 //
K10bsu022_u:4853: sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṃ te yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4854: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo // Lal_16.30 //
K10bsu022_u:4855: yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim /
K10bsu022_u:4856: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṃbho // Lal_16.31 //
K10bsu022_u:4857: punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā /
K10bsu022_u:4858: svakajanaparivārito narendraḥ punarapi rājagṛhaṃ anupraviṣṭaḥ // Lal_16.32 //
K10bsu022_u:4859: magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam /
K10bsu022_u:4860: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṃ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ // Lal_16.33 //
K10bsu022_u:4865: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4866: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4867: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam /
K10bsu022_u:4868: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto 'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4870: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet /
K10bsu022_u:4871: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4872: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet /
K10bsu022_u:4873: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti
K10bsu022_u:4874: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:4875: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputrametadavocat - kaste mārṣa śāstā,
K10bsu022_u:4877: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha - na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā /
K10bsu022_u:4878: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti /
K10bsu022_u:4881: bodhisattva āha - labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
K10bsu022_u:4884: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma /
K10bsu022_u:4885: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa
K10bsu022_u:4886: ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi
K10bsu022_u:4887: samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
K10bsu022_u:4888: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:4889: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
K10bsu022_u:4891: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā /
K10bsu022_u:4892: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
K10bsu022_u:4893: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo 'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4895: tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
K10bsu022_u:4898: bodhisattva āha - naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate //
K10bsu022_u:4899: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti //
K10bsu022_u:4900: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4901: teṣāmetadabhūt - yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
K10bsu022_u:4902: na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
K10bsu022_u:4909: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan //
K10bsu022_u:4910: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
K10bsu022_u:4911: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
K10bsu022_u:4912: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
K10bsu022_u:4913: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:4914: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
K10bsu022_u:4915: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4917: ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:4919: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
K10bsu022_u:4921: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
K10bsu022_u:4922: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
K10bsu022_u:4923: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
K10bsu022_u:4925: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
K10bsu022_u:4926: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam
K10bsu022_u:4927: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
K10bsu022_u:4929: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma //
K10bsu022_u:4931: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
K10bsu022_u:4932: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti /
K10bsu022_u:4933: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
K10bsu022_u:4935: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
K10bsu022_u:4936: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca //
K10bsu022_u:4937: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
K10bsu022_u:4941: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
K10bsu022_u:4942: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
K10bsu022_u:4943: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:4944: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
K10bsu022_u:4946: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
K10bsu022_u:4947: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
K10bsu022_u:4948: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca //
K10bsu022_u:4949: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca /
K10bsu022_u:4950: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
K10bsu022_u:4951: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
K10bsu022_u:4953: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:4954: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
K10bsu022_u:4955: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano 'tīva prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:4959: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - pañcakaṣāyakāle 'hamiha jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo
K10bsu022_u:4988: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā
K10bsu022_u:4990: tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
K10bsu022_u:4992: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti //
K10bsu022_u:4993: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
K10bsu022_u:4997: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
K10bsu022_u:5002: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
K10bsu022_u:5003: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam /
K10bsu022_u:5004: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena (Vaidya 184)
K10bsu022_u:5007: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
K10bsu022_u:5009: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ
K10bsu022_u:5010: parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ
K10bsu022_u:5014: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
K10bsu022_u:5016: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5018: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5019: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
K10bsu022_u:5020: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5022: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ //
K10bsu022_u:5023: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
K10bsu022_u:5024: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām /
K10bsu022_u:5026: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
K10bsu022_u:5027: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma //
K10bsu022_u:5028: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
K10bsu022_u:5031: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
K10bsu022_u:5032: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma //
K10bsu022_u:5033: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5037: mā khalvayaṃ śākyanarendragarbho hyapūrṇasaṃkalpa ihaiva raṇye /
K10bsu022_u:5038: kṛtvā trilokaṃ dukhitaṃ hyanāthaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyatyakṛtārtha eva // Lal_17.1 //
K10bsu022_u:5041: vayaṃ purā te tuṣiteṣu nāthā kva sā pratijñā tava śuddhasattva // Lal_17.2 //
K10bsu022_u:5042: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti - kālagataḥ kumāraḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5043: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
K10bsu022_u:5047: yadā jāto 'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye /
K10bsu022_u:5048: siṃhavaccāgṛhītastvaṃ prakrāntaḥ sapta padā svayam // Lal_17.3 //
K10bsu022_u:5049: diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā /

K10bsu022_u:5319: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca /

K10bsu022_u:5331: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan /

K10bsu022_u:5338: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma - āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ /

K10bsu022_u:5340: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5347: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo 'bhyudgato 'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam
K10bsu022_u:5348: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti //
K10bsu022_u:5349: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - labdhaṃ mayā pāṃśukūlam /
