K10bsu022_u:5361: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha - dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam /
K10bsu022_u:5363: tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5368: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt - āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti /
K10bsu022_u:5371: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5372: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma //
K10bsu022_u:5374: sa divyāni cīvarāṇi kāṣāyaraṅgaraktāni kalpikāni śramaṇasārūpyāṇi bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5375: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho 'bhut //
K10bsu022_u:5376: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye - yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5378: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti /
K10bsu022_u:5380: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma /
K10bsu022_u:5382: bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5383: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma - tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:5385: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati /
K10bsu022_u:5388: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma - gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya /
K10bsu022_u:5390: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat /
K10bsu022_u:5396: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve 'nyatīrthikā nigṛhītā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5398: tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha - na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
K10bsu022_u:5401: sujātā āha - gacchottare sa eva brāhmaṇaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:5405: sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā (Vaidya 196)
K10bsu022_u:5407: tato bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturniveśanaṃ gatvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
K10bsu022_u:5408: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā suvarṇamayīṃ pātrīṃ madhupāyasapūrṇāṃ bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:5411: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat - iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī /
K10bsu022_u:5414: bodhisattva āha - na mamedṛśena bhājanena prayojanam /
K10bsu022_u:5417: atha bodhisattvastaṃ piṇḍapātramādāyorubilvāyā niṣkramya nāganadīṃ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye
K10bsu022_u:5418: nadīṃ nairañjanāmupasaṃkramya taṃ piṇḍapātraṃ cīvarāṇi caikānte nikṣipya nadīṃ nairañjanāmavatarati
K10bsu022_u:5420: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ snāyato 'nekāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi divyāgurucandanacūrṇavilepanairnadīmāloḍayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5421: divyāni ca nānāvarṇāni kusumāni jale kṣipanti sma yaduta bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe //
K10bsu022_u:5422: tena khalu punaḥ samayena nairañjanā nadī divyairgandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca samākulā vahati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5424: taṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhyutkṣipya svakasvakāni bhavanāni nayanti sma caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca //
K10bsu022_u:5426: tāni sarvāṇi sujātā grāmikaduhitā maṅgalyānīti kṛtvā caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca parigṛhṇīte sma //
K10bsu022_u:5427: nadyuttīrṇaśca bodhisattvaḥ pulinaṃ nirīkṣate sma upaveṣṭukāmaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5428: atha yā nairañjanāyāṃ nadyāṃ nāgakanyā sā dharaṇitalādabhyudgabhya maṇimayaṃ (manoramaṃ)
K10bsu022_u:5430: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya /
K10bsu022_u:5431: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5432: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito 'bhut pūjārheti kṛtvā /
K10bsu022_u:5433: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5435: tadā svarūpeṇādareṇa yācitvā trāyatriṃśadbhavanaṃ nītavān pūjārthaṃ caityārthaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:5437: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pātrīmaho vartate /
K10bsu022_u:5438: tacca bhadrāsanaṃ tayaiva nāgakanyayā parigṛhītaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca //
K10bsu022_u:5441: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvasya puṇyabalena prajñābalena pūrvikā kāye śubhavarṇapuṣkaratā prādurabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:5444: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan so 'haṃ dhyānaabhijñajñānabalavānevaṃ kṛśāṅgo 'pi san /
K10bsu022_u:5445: gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ buddhituṃ no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā // Lal_18.23 //
K10bsu022_u:5446: yattvaudārika bhuktva bhojanavaraṃ kāye balaṃ kṛtvanā gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ budhyitum /
K10bsu022_u:5447: mā haivetvarapuṇya devamanujā lūhena jñānekṣiṇo no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ // Lal_18.24 //
K10bsu022_u:5448: sā ca grāmikadhīta pūrvacaritā nāmnā sujātā iti
K10bsu022_u:5449: yajñā nityu yajāti evamanasā siddhe vrataṃ nāyake /
K10bsu022_u:5450: sā devāna niśāmya codana tadā gṛhyā madhūpāyasaṃ
K10bsu022_u:5451: upagamyā naditīri hṛṣṭamanasā nairañjanāyāḥ sthitā // Lal_18.25 //
K10bsu022_u:5454: tīrṇastāraku pārasattva matimāṃ snāne matiṃ cintayan
K10bsu022_u:5455: oruhyā nadi snāpi śuddhavimalo lokānukampī muniḥ // Lal_18.26 //
K10bsu022_u:5456: devā koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasā gandhāmbu cūrṇāni ca
K10bsu022_u:5457: oruhyā nadi loḍayanti salilaṃ snānārtha sattvottame /
K10bsu022_u:5458: snānā snātvana bodhisattva vimalastīre sthitaḥ sūrataḥ
K10bsu022_u:5460: kāṣāyāni ca vastra nirmala śubhā tā devaputro dade
K10bsu022_u:5461: kalpīyāni ca saṃnivāsya bhagavāṃstīre hi nadyāḥ sthitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5462: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasā bhadrāsanaṃ sā nyaṣīt
K10bsu022_u:5463: yatrāsau niṣasāda śāntamanaso lokasya cakṣuṣkaraḥ // Lal_18.28 //
K10bsu022_u:5465: dattvā bhojanu sā sujāta matimāṃ svarṇāmaye bhājane
K10bsu022_u:5466: vanditvā caraṇāni sā pramuditā paribhuṅkṣva me sārathe /
K10bsu022_u:5467: bhuktvā bhojanu yāvadartha matimān pātrīṃ jale prākṣipat
K10bsu022_u:5468: tāṃ jagrāha puraṃdaraḥ suraguruḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmyaham // Lal_18.29 //
K10bsu022_u:5469: yada bhuktaṃ ca jinena bhojanavaraṃ odārikaṃ tatkṣaṇe
K10bsu022_u:5470: tasyā kāyabalaṃ ca tejaśiriyā pūrvaṃ yathā saṃsthitam /
K10bsu022_u:5471: dharmā kṛtva kathā sujāta maruṇāṃ kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuṃ
K10bsu022_u:5477: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ snātvā ca bhuktvā kāyabalasthāma
K10bsu022_u:5478: saṃjanayya yena ṣoḍaśākārasaṃpannapṛthivipradeśe mahābodhidrumarājamūlaṃ tena pratasthe
K10bsu022_u:5492: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvacca nadyā nairañjanāyā yāvacca bodhimaṇḍādestasminnantare vātabalāhakairdevaputraiḥ saṃmṛṣṭamabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:5494: yāvadeva trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau vṛkṣāste sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastenābhinatāgrā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5495: ye 'pi ca tadahojātā bāladārikāste 'pi bodhimaṇḍaśīrṣakāḥ svapanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5496: ye 'pi ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sumerupramukhāḥ parvatāste 'pi sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastena praṇatā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5497: nadīṃ ca nairañjanāmupādāya yāvadbodhimaṇḍo 'sminnantare kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ krośavistāraikapramāṇo mārgo 'bhivyūhito 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:5498: tasya ca mārgasya vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayoḥ saptaratnamayī vedikā abhinirmitā 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:5499: saptatālānuccaistvena upariṣṭādratnajālasaṃchannā divyachatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtā iṣukṣepe saptaratnamayāstālā abhinirmitā abhūvan tasyā vedikāyā abhyudgatāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5501: dvayośca tālayormadhye puṣkariṇī māpitābhūt gandhodakaparipūrṇā suvarṇavālikrāsaṃstṛtā
K10bsu022_u:5504: taṃ ca mārgamaśītyapsaraḥsahasrāṇi gandhodakena siñcanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5506: sarvasya ca tālavṛkṣasya purato ratnavyomakaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:5507: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavyomake aśītyapsaraḥ sahasrāṇi candanāgurucūrṇakapuṭāparigṛhītāni kārānusāridhūpaghaṭikāparigṛhītāni sthitānyabhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5509: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prakampyamānaiḥ kṣetrai raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayaṃstūryaśatasahasraiḥ pravādyamānaiḥ,
K10bsu022_u:5516: anenaivaṃrūpeṇa mārgavyūhena bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaṃ gacchati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5518: tāmeva rātriṃ vaśavartī nāma trisāhasramahāsāhasrādhipatirbrahmā sahāpatirbrahmaparṣadamāmantryaivamāha - yatkhalu mārṣā jānīyāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5519: eṣa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāpratijñānutsṛṣṭo dṛḍhasaṃnāhasaṃnaddho
K10bsu022_u:5537: atha khalu vaśavartī mahābrahmā tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:5538: yasyā tejatu puṇyataśca śiriye brāhmaḥ patho jñāyate maitrī vā karuṇā upekṣa muditā dhyānānyabhijñāstathā /
K10bsu022_u:5541: pūjāṃ sādhu karotha tasya munino āśivrate sādhanām // Lal_19.1 //
K10bsu022_u:5542: yaṃ gatvā śaraṇaṃ na durgatibhayaṃ prāpnoti naivākṣaṇaṃ
K10bsu022_u:5543: deveṣviṣṭasukhaṃ ca prāpya vipulaṃ brahmālayaṃ gacchati /
K10bsu022_u:5545: sādhū sarvi udagrahṛṣṭamanasaḥ pūjāsya kurvāmahe // Lal_19.2 //
K10bsu022_u:5547: śakrābrahmapure ca candrasuriye nāstyasya kaścit samaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5549: saiṣo 'dya vrajate mahādrumavaraṃ mārasya jetuṃ camūn // Lal_19.3 //
K10bsu022_u:5550: mūrdhnaṃ yasya na śakyamīkṣitumiha brahmālaye 'pi sthitaiḥ
K10bsu022_u:5553: cittaṃ yasya praśānta doṣarahitaṃ gacchāma tatpūjane // Lal_19.4 //
K10bsu022_u:5554: yeṣāṃ vā mati brahmaśakrabhavane nityaṃ sukha kṣepituṃ
K10bsu022_u:5555: athavā sarvakileśabandhanalatāṃ chettuṃ hi tāṃ jālinīm /
K10bsu022_u:5557: buddhatvaṃ yadi vepsitaṃ tribhuvane pūjetvasau nāyakam // Lal_19.5 //
K10bsu022_u:5562: iti hi bhikṣavastrisāhasramahāsāhasriko mahābrahmā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ samamadhyatiṣṭhat /
K10bsu022_u:5566: sarve ca tadā mahāsamudrā dharaṇītalasaṃsthitā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5568: imaṃ caiva lokadhātumalaṃkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca daśasu dikṣu śakrabrahmalokapālairbodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe buddhakṣetraśatasahasrāṇi samalaṃkṛtānyabhūvan
K10bsu022_u:5569: bodhisattvaiśca divyamānuṣyakātikrāntaiḥ pūjāvyūhairdaśasu dikṣvaprameyāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi pratimaṇḍitānyabhūvan (Vaidya 202)
K10bsu022_u:5571: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇyekamiva buddhakṣetraṃ saṃdṛśyante sma,
K10bsu022_u:5573: na ca bhūyo lokāntarikā na ca kālaparvatā na ca cakravālamahācakravālāḥ prajñāyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:5574: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bodhisattvasyābhayā sphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:5576: tadyathā - utkhalī ca nāma devaputraḥ sūtkhalī ca nāma prajāpatiśca śūrabalaśca keyūrabalaśca
K10bsu022_u:5577: supratisthitaśca mahiṃdharaśca avabhāsakaraśca vimalaśca dharmeśvaraśca dharmaketuśca
K10bsu022_u:5579: itīme ṣoḍaśa bodhimaṇḍapratipālakā devaputrāḥ sarve 'vaivartyakṣāntipratilabdhāste bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ maṇḍayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:5580: samantādaśītiyojanāni saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ parivṛtam,
K10bsu022_u:5582: ye ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu vividhā vṛkṣāḥ santyabhijātā abhipūjitā divyamānuṣyakāste 'pi sarve tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:5583: yāśca daśasu dikṣu nānāprakārā jalasthalajāḥ puṣpajātayastā api sarvāstatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:5584: ye 'pi ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā bodhimaṇḍālaṃkurvantyapramāṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāravyūhaiste 'pi tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma //
K10bsu022_u:5585: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaparipālakairdevaputraistādṛśā vyūhā bodhimaṇḍe abhinirmitā abhūvan,
K10bsu022_u:5591: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatā bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ māpayanti sma mūlasaṃpannaṃ
K10bsu022_u:5593: darśanīyaṃ vistīrṇamaśītistālānuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa pariṇāhena citraṃ darśanīyaṃ
K10bsu022_u:5594: manoramaṃ saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhī ratnatālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī
K10bsu022_u:5596: sa ca pṛthivīpradeśastrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuvajreṇābhidṛḍhaḥ sāro 'bhedyavajramayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt yatra bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo 'bhūdbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ
K10bsu022_u:5597: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvena bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramatā tathārūpā kāyātprabhā muktābhūt,
K10bsu022_u:5612: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin samaye rāgo bādhate dveṣo va moho vā krodho vā lobho vā khilo vā vyāpādo vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryo vā /
K10bsu022_u:5616: sarvasattvāśca tasmin samaye maitracittā hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino 'bhūvan //
K10bsu022_u:5619: duḥkhaṃ praśāntaṃ sattvānāṃ sukhaṃ vindanti vedanām // Lal_19.7 //
K10bsu022_u:5621: maitracittā hite jātāḥ spṛṣṭā bhābhirmahāmune // Lal_19.8 //
K10bsu022_u:5628: rāgadveṣādibhiḥ kleśaiḥ sattvā bādhyanta ye sadā /
K10bsu022_u:5632: na khilaṃ na ca mātsaryaṃ vyāpādo na ca vigrahaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5639: sarve te vipulāḥ kṣetrāḥ dṛśyantyekaṃ yathā tathā // Lal_19.17 //
K10bsu022_u:5646: te sarve tatra dṛśyante bodhisattvasya tejasā // Lal_19.20 //
K10bsu022_u:5648: svāni svāni vimānāni śmaśānānīva menire // Lal_19.21 //
K10bsu022_u:5656: pārijāto divi yathā tasmādapi viśiṣyate // Lal_19.25 //
K10bsu022_u:5657: guṇāḥ śakyā na te vācā sarve saṃparikīrtitum /
K10bsu022_u:5659: iti hi bhikṣavastayā bodhisattvasya kāyapramuktayā prabhayā kālikasya nāgarājasya
K10bsu022_u:5662: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kāliko nāgarājastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svasya parivārasya purataḥ sthitvemā gāthā abhāṣat -
K10bsu022_u:5663: krakuchande yatha ābha dṛṣṭa rucirā dṛṣṭā ca kanakāhvaye
K10bsu022_u:5666: yenedaṃ bhavanaṃ virocati hi me svarṇaprabhālaṃkṛtam // Lal_19.27 //
K10bsu022_u:5668: no cāgnerna maṇerna vidyudamalā no ca prabhā jyotiṣām /
K10bsu022_u:5669: no vā śakraprabhā na brahmaṇa prabhā no ca prabhā āsurī
K10bsu022_u:5670: ekāntaṃ tamasākulaṃ mama gṛhaṃ prāgduṣkṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ // Lal_19.28 //
K10bsu022_u:5672: adyedaṃ bhavanaṃ virājati śubhaṃ madhye raviṃdīptivat
K10bsu022_u:5673: cittaṃ prīti janeti kāyu sukhito gātrādbhutā śītalā /
K10bsu022_u:5674: taptā vālika yā śarīri nipatī jātā sa me śītalā

K10bsu022_u:5919: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣu ratnavyomakeṣu dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtān bodhisattvavigrahānabhinirmimīte sma /
K10bsu022_u:5920: sarve ca te bodhisattvavigrahā divyamānuṣyakapuṣpadāmaparigṛhītā yena bodhisattvastenābhinatakāyāstāni puṣpadāmānyabhipralambayanti sma /

K10bsu022_u:5923: brahmaghoṣavacanaṃ madhuravāṇiṃ bodhimaṇḍopagataṃ śirasi vande // Lal_20.8 //
K10bsu022_u:5927: buddhakṣetrādratnagarbho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san
K10bsu022_u:5928: gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:5929: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tasmin vaidūryamayamaṇḍalamātre jāmbūnadasuvarṇapadmānyabhyudgatānyupadarśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5930: teṣāṃ ca padmānāṃ karṇikāsvardhakāyikā nāryo varṇarūpasaṃpannāḥ sarvālaṃkārapratimaṇḍitā upadarśayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:5932: puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni cābhipralambayantyo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenoparyabhinatakāyāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5935: nirmāṇasuśīla sadojju praṣṭho tasyā onamathā guṇadharasya // Lal_20.9 //
K10bsu022_u:5937: atha khalūpariṣṭāddiśo varagaganāyā lokadhātorgaṇendrasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādgaganagañjo
K10bsu022_u:5938: nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ
K10bsu022_u:5939: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:5940: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe gaganatalastha eva yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāḥ
K10bsu022_u:5944: sarvā gaganatalānmahāntaṃ puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣanti sma sarvasattvaprītisukhasaṃjananaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:5945: na ca kasyacitsattvasya bhayaṃ cotpīḍāṃ vā karoti sma //
K10bsu022_u:5947: peyālameṣa diśatāsu jinaurasā ye saṃpūjituṃ hitakaraṃ anuprāpta bodhim /
K10bsu022_u:5948: teṣāṃ viyūhakramavikramasukramāṇāṃ opamyamātra niśṛṇotha jinaurasānām // Lal_20.10 //
K10bsu022_u:5949: ke cāgatā nabhasi megha iva stananto hārā sahasranayutāni pralambayantaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5950: ke cāgatā makuṭaratnavilambacūḍāḥ pauṣpaṃ vimāna gagane upadarśayantaḥ // Lal_20.11 //
K10bsu022_u:5952: ke cāgatā dharaṇisiṃha ivā nadantaḥ śūnyānimittapraṇidhīravamuñcamānāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5953: ke cāgatā yatha vṛṣā abhinandamānāḥ na ca dṛṣṭapūrva rucirāṇi kṣipanti puṣpāṃ // Lal_20.12 //
K10bsu022_u:5954: ke cāgatā nabhasi sāra ivā ravanto varṇāsahasra svaki ātmani darśayantaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5955: ke cāgatā śaśirivā gagane supūrṇāḥ sugatātmajasya guṇamālamudīrayantaḥ // Lal_20.13 //
K10bsu022_u:5956: ke cāgatā raviriva prabha muñcamānāḥ sarvāṇi mārabhavanāni karonti jihmā /
K10bsu022_u:5957: ke cāgatā vimalaketu yathendrayaṣṭyaḥ saṃbhārapuṇyanicitāstahi bodhimaṇḍe // Lal_20.14 //
K10bsu022_u:5958: kecitkṣipanti gaganānmaṇiratnajālā candrā sucandra tatha bāla virocamānā /
K10bsu022_u:5959: māndāravā sumanavārṣikacampadāmā saṃbodhisattva drumarājasthite kṣipanti // Lal_20.15 //
K10bsu022_u:5960: ke cāgatā dharaṇi kampayamāna padbhyāṃ saṃkampitā vasudha prītikarī janasya /
K10bsu022_u:5961: ke cāgatā grahiya meru karetalebhiḥ utsṛṣṭapuṣpapuṭa saṃsthita antarīkṣe // Lal_20.16 //
K10bsu022_u:5962: ke cāgatāścaturi sāgara gṛhya mūrdhnā utsṛṣṭa siñci vasudhāṃ varagandhatoyaiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5963: ke cāgatā ratanayaṣṭi gṛhītva citraṃ saṃbodhisattvamupadarśaya sthitva dūre // Lal_20.17 //
K10bsu022_u:5964: ke cāgatā bhaviya brahma praśāntarūpāḥ śāntā praśāntamanasaḥ sthita dhyānadhyāyī /
K10bsu022_u:5965: romebhi teṣa svaru niścarate manojña maitrīupekṣakaruṇāmuditāpramāṇā // Lal_20.18 //
K10bsu022_u:5966: ke cāgatā maruta śakra ivā yathaiva devaiḥ sahasranayutaiśca purākṛtāste /
K10bsu022_u:5968: upagamya bodhivaṭu gṛhya kṛtāñjalībhiḥ śakrābhilagna maṇiratna kṣipanti citrā // Lal_20.19 //
K10bsu022_u:5969: ke cāgatāścatudiśā ca yathaiva pālā gandharvarākṣasaparīvṛta kinnarebhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5970: vidyutsphuṭānta kusumāni pravarṣamāṇāḥ gandharvakinnararūtena stuvanti vīram // Lal_20.20 //
K10bsu022_u:5971: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāṃ pragṛhītva vṛkṣān saphalāṃ sapuṣpavaragandha pramuñcamānāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:5972: jāteṣu teṣu sthita buddha śuddhakāyāḥ avalambamāna pratimaṇḍi kṣipanti puṣpā // Lal_20.21 //
K10bsu022_u:5973: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāḥ puḍinī gṛhītvā padmotpalaiḥ kusumitaistatha puṇḍarīkaiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5974: dvātriṃśalakṣaṇadharāḥ sthita padmagarbhe staviṣṭa aliptamanasaṃ vidu bodhisattvam // Lal_20.22 //
K10bsu022_u:5975: ke cāgatā vipulakāya tatheva meru sthitvāntarīkṣa svakamātmanamutsṛjanti /
K10bsu022_u:5976: utsṛjyamātra bhaviyā navapuṣpadāmāḥ saṃchādayanti trisahasri jinasya kṣetram // Lal_20.23 //
K10bsu022_u:5977: ke cāgatā ubhayacakṣuṣi kalpadāhaṃ saṃdarśayanta vibhavaṃ tatha saṃbhavaṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:5978: teṣāṃ śarīri bahudharmasukhā raṇanti tāṃ śrutva sattvanayutā prajahanti tṛṣṇām // Lal_20.24 //
K10bsu022_u:5980: kanyā yathaiva sualaṃkṛta citrahārāḥ prekṣanta yāṃ suragaṇā na labhanti tṛptim // Lal_20.25 //
K10bsu022_u:5981: ke cāgatā vajirakāya ivā abhedyāḥ heṣṭhā paskandhacaraṇaiḥ pratigrāhyamāṇāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5983: ke cāgatā ravirivā śaśipūrṇavaktrāḥ jyotsnākarāḥ prabhakarā hatakleśadoṣāḥ // Lal_20.26 //
K10bsu022_u:5984: ke cāgatā ratanamaṇḍita ratnapāṇī saṃchādayitva bahukṣetrasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5985: varṣanti ratnavara puṣpa sugandhagandhā saṃtoṣaṇārthaṃ bahusattvahitaṃ sukhārtham // Lal_20.27 //
K10bsu022_u:5986: ke cāgatā mahati dhāraṇi ratnakośāḥ romebhi sūtranayutāni prabhāṣamāṇāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:5987: pratibhānavanta mativanta subuddhivanto mattapramattajanatāṃ pratibodhayantaḥ // Lal_20.28 //
K10bsu022_u:5988: ke cāgatā grahiya bheri yathaiva meru ākoṭyamānu gagane sumanojñaghoṣām /
K10bsu022_u:5989: yasyā ravaṃ daśadiśe vraji kṣetrakoṭyā adyāvaboddhumamataṃ anubuddhi śāstā // Lal_20.29 //
K10bsu022_u:5995: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaiścema evaṃrūpā vyūhā bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe bodhimaṇḍe 'bhisaṃkṛtā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:5996: svayaṃ ca bodhisattvo yāvanto daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K10bsu022_u:5997: sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhimaṇḍālaṃkāravyūhāstān sarvāṃstasmin bodhimaṇḍe saṃdarśayati sma //
K10bsu022_u:5998: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - iha khalu kāmadhātau māraḥ pāpīyānadhipatirīśvaro vaśavartī /
K10bsu022_u:6001: tasmin vijite sarve kāmāvacarā devādayo nigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu022_u:6002: tataśca māraparṣadaḥ pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlā mārakāyikā devaputrāste mama siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayiṣyanti
K10bsu022_u:6003: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva evamanuvicintya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt sarvamāramaṇḍalavidhvaṃsanakarīṃ nāmaikāṃ raśmimudasṛjat
K10bsu022_u:6004: yayā raśmyā sarvasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya jihmīkṛtāni saṃprakampitāni cābhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:6006: tasyāśca prabhāyā māraḥ pāpīyānidamevaṃ rūpaṃ śabdamaśrauṣīt -
K10bsu022_u:6007: kalpaughacīrṇacarito hyabhiśuddhasattvaḥ śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ pravijahya rājyam /
K10bsu022_u:6008: so nirgato hitakaro hyamṛtābhilāṣī bodhidrumaṃ hyupagato 'dya kuru prayatnam // Lal_21.1 //
K10bsu022_u:6009: so tīrṇa ātmana parānapi tārayeyā moceṣyate sa ca parāṃ svayameva muktaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:6010: āśvāsaprāpta sa parānapi cāśvaseyā nirvāpayiṣyati parāṃ parinirvṛtaśca // Lal_21.2 //
K10bsu022_u:6011: śūnyāṃ kariṣyati āpāyatrayo 'pyaśeṣāṃ pūrṇāṃ kariṣyati purāṃ suramānuṣāṇām /
K10bsu022_u:6012: dhyānānabhijña paramaṃ amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ca dāsyatyasau hitakaro amṛtaṃ spṛśitvā // Lal_21.3 //
K10bsu022_u:6013: śūnyaṃ kariṣyati puraṃ tava kṛṣṇabandho abalo balo balavihīnu apakṣyapakṣyo /
K10bsu022_u:6015: na jñāsyase kva nu vrajāmi karomi kiṃ vā yada dharmavarṣamabhivarṣi svayaṃ svayaṃbhūḥ // Lal_21.4 //
K10bsu022_u:6017: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyānābhiḥ saṃcodanābhirgāthābhiḥ saṃcoditaḥ san dvātriṃśadākāraṃ svapnamapaśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6029: priyajanaparivārāśca māramutsṛjya dīnamukhā ekānte gatvā pradhyāyantamapaśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6030: agramahiṣīṃ ca māriṇīṃ śayanabhraṣṭāṃ dharaṇyāmubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śīrṣamabhipīḍayantīmapaśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6031: ye ca te māraputrā vīryavattamāśca balavattamāśca tejavattamāśca prajñāvattamāśca taṃ bodhisattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ namasyanta evamapaśyat
K10bsu022_u:6032: ātmanīyāśca duhitrīrhā tāta hā tāteti krandantyo 'paśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6037: tān sarvān hastāñśirasi kṛtvā rodantaḥ krandantaḥ palāyamānāṃścāpaśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6038: ye ca te kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu devādhipatayaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:6055: iti hi bhikṣava evaṃ dvātriṃśadākāraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svapnamapaśyat /
K10bsu022_u:6056: sa pratibuddhaḥ san bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ sarvamantarjanaṃ saṃnipātya sabalapārṣadyasenāpatidauvārikasaṃnipatitāṃśca tān viditvā ābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣat
K10bsu022_u:6058: dṛṣṭvāna tāṃ sa supināṃ namucī dukhārto āmantrayāti suta ye 'pi ca pāriṣadyā /
K10bsu022_u:6059: senāpatiṃ namuci siṃhahanuśca nāmnā sarveṣa teṣa paripṛcchati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ // Lal_21.5 //
K10bsu022_u:6061: ṣaḍvarṣa duṣkaravratāni caritva ghorā bodhidrumaṃ hyupagataḥ prakuruṣva yatnam // Lal_21.6 //
K10bsu022_u:6062: so cedvibuddha svayameva hi bodhisattvo bahusattvakoṭinayutāni vibodhayeta /
K10bsu022_u:6063: śūnyaṃ kariṣyati sa me bhavanaṃ hyaśeṣaṃ yada lapsyate hyamṛtu sparśanaśītibhāvam // Lal_21.7 //
K10bsu022_u:6064: hanta vrajāma sahitā mahatā balena ghātema taṃ śramaṇu eku drumendramūle /
K10bsu022_u:6065: udyojayadhva caturaṅgiṇi śīghra senāṃ yadi icchathā mama priyaṃ ma ciraṃ karotha // Lal_21.8 //
K10bsu022_u:6066: pratyekabuddhabhi ca arhabhiḥ pūrṇa loko nirvāyamāṇu na balaṃ mama durbalaṃ syāt /
K10bsu022_u:6067: so bhūyu eku jinu bheṣyati dharmarājo gaṇanātivṛttu jinavaṃśu na jātu chidyet // Lal_21.9 //
K10bsu022_u:6068: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sārthavāho nāma māraputraḥ,
K10bsu022_u:6070: kiṃ tāt bhinnavadano 'si vivarṇavaktro hṛdayaṃ samutplavati vedhati te 'ṅgamaṅgam /
K10bsu022_u:6071: kiṃ te śrutaṃ athava dṛṣṭu bhaṇāhi śīghraṃ jñāsyāma tattvatu vicintya tathā prayogam // Lal_21.10 //
K10bsu022_u:6072: nirmāṇu māru avacī śṛṇu mahya vatsa pāpaṃ mi dṛṣṭu supinaṃ paramaṃ sughoram /
K10bsu022_u:6073: bhāṣeya sarvamiha parṣadi adya śeṣaṃ saṃmūrchitā kṣititale prapateyu yūyam // Lal_21.11 //
K10bsu022_u:6076: raṇakāli prāpti yadi nāma jayo na doṣaḥ tatraiva yastu nihato bhavate sa doṣaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:6077: svapnāntare tu yadi īdṛśa te nimittā śreyo upekṣa ma raṇe paribhāvu gacchet // Lal_21.12 //
K10bsu022_u:6079: vyavasāyabuddhi puruṣasya raṇe prasiddhi avalambya dhairya sukṛtaṃ yadi no jayaṃ syāt /
K10bsu022_u:6080: kā tasya śakti mama dṛṣṭi sapāriṣadyaṃ notthātu mahya caraṇe śirasā prapattum // Lal_21.13 //
K10bsu022_u:6082: vistīrṇamasti hi balaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca astyeka śūru balavāṃśca raṇaṃjahaśca /
K10bsu022_u:6083: khadyotakairyadi bhavettrisahasra pūrṇā eko ravirgrasati niṣprabhatāṃ karoti // Lal_21.14 //
K10bsu022_u:6085: yasya mānaśca mohaśca mīmāṃsā ca na vidyate /
K10bsu022_u:6086: viloma yadi vidvāṃso nāsau śakyaścikitsitum // Lal_21.15 //
K10bsu022_u:6087: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyān sārthavāhasya vacanamakṛtvā mahatīṃ caturaṅginīṃ senāmudyojayati
K10bsu022_u:6099: (Vaidya 222) kecijjvalitān parvatān parigṛhya salīlamapareṣu parvateṣu abhirūḍhā āgacchanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:6103: keciddakodariṇo durbalakāyā asthikaṅkālasaṃghāṭamabhinirmāya bhagnanāsāḥ kumbhodarāḥ karoṭapādā ucchuṣkatvagmāṃsarudhirāḥ chinnakarṇanāsākaracaraṇanayanottamāṅgāḥ
K10bsu022_u:6106: kecidāhuḥ - āharata haratābhihanata hanata bandhata gṛhṇata chindata bhindata mathayatotkṣipata nāśayatemaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ sārdhaṃ drameṇeti bruvanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:6118: kecidasidhanuśaraśaktipaṭṭiśaparaśucakratomarakaṇayavajrabhuśuṇḍibhindipālādīni nānāpraharaṇāni bhrāmayanto nṛtyanto bodhisattvaṃ saṃtarjayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:6127: kṣipanto vajrāśaniṃ pramuñcantastaptāmayovālikāṃ pravarṣantaḥ kālameghān saṃjanayanto
K10bsu022_u:6128: vātavṛṣṭimutpādayantaḥ śarameghavarṣānutsṛjantaḥ kālarātriṃ darśayanto rāvaṃ saṃjanayanto
K10bsu022_u:6130: kecitpāśān bhrāmayanto mahāparvatān prapātayanto mahāsāgarān kṣobhayanto laṅghayanto
K10bsu022_u:6131: mahāparvatāṃścālayanto meruṃ parvatarājaṃ vidhāvantaḥ palāyamānā vikṣipanto 'ṅgapratyaṅgāni
K10bsu022_u:6132: bhrāmayantaḥ śarīrāṇi hasanto mahāhāsyāni urāṃsi prasphoṭayantaḥ urāṃsi tāḍayantaḥ
K10bsu022_u:6133: keśāṃsi dhunvantaḥ pītamukhāni ca nīlaśarīrā jvalitaśirasa ūrdhvakeśā itastato vegena
K10bsu022_u:6135: jīrṇāḥ striyaśca rudantyo bodhisattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadanti sma - aho putra,
K10bsu022_u:6139: rākṣasarūpāḥ piśācarūpāḥ kāṇakhañjadurbalāśca pretāḥ kṣutkṣāmākṣā urdhvabāhavo vikṛtāsyāḥ krandanto bhayamupadarśayantastrāsaṃ saṃjanayanto bodhisattvasya purato 'bhidhāvanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:6140: tayā caivarūpayā mārasenayā samuditayā samantādaśītiryojanānyāyāmena vistāreṇa sphuṭamabhūt /
K10bsu022_u:6141: yathā caikasya mārasyaivaṃ koṭīśatānāṃ trisāhasraparyāpannānāṃ mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ senābhistiryagūrdhvaṃ ca parisphuṭamabhūt //
K10bsu022_u:6145: yattaka loki virūpa suraudrāḥ sarvi ta nirmita tatra śaṭhebhiḥ // Lal_21.16 //
K10bsu022_u:6148: ekapadā dvipadā tripadāśca yāvatsahasrapadā bahu anye // Lal_21.17 //
K10bsu022_u:6149: nīlamukhāni ca pītaśarīrā pītamukhāni ca nīlaśarīrā /
K10bsu022_u:6150: anyamukhāni ca anyaśarīrāḥ ekamupāgatu kiṃkarasainyam // Lal_21.18 //
K10bsu022_u:6151: vātu pravāyati varṣati varṣaṃ vidyusahasraśatāni patanti /
K10bsu022_u:6152: deva guḍāyati vṛkṣa luḍanti bodhivaṭasya na īryati patram // Lal_21.19 //
K10bsu022_u:6153: varṣati deva pravarṣati varṣaṃ ogha vahanti jalākulabhūmim /
K10bsu022_u:6154: īdṛśa bhīṣaṇikā bahurāśī yatra acetana vṛkṣa patanti // Lal_21.20 //
K10bsu022_u:6155: dṛṣṭva ca tānatibhīṣaṇarūpāṃ sarvi visaṃsthita rūpavirūpāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:6156: śrīguṇalakṣaṇatejadharasyā cittu na kampati meru yathaiva // Lal_21.21 //

K10bsu022_u:8010: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - ko 'nyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ suvineyaḥ pūrvavadyāvanna ca dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
K10bsu022_u:8011: tato bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - ayaṃ khalvapyārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ śuddho yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
K10bsu022_u:8014: śuddhāvāsakāyikā api ca devatā enamarthaṃ tathāgatasyārocayanti sma - evametadbhagavan,
K10bsu022_u:8018: ya imamevaṃ supraṇītaṃ dharmamaśrutvā kālagata iti //
K10bsu022_u:8019: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - kaḥ khalvanyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāro yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti //
K10bsu022_u:8020: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - te khalu pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ śuddhāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suviśodhakā mandarāgadoṣamohā aparokṣavijñānāḥ
K10bsu022_u:8026: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ prathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam //
K10bsu022_u:8027: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya punaretadabhavat - kasminnetarhi pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ prativasanti?
K10bsu022_u:8028: atha tathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan paśyati sma /
K10bsu022_u:8029: adrākṣītpañcakān bhadravargīyān vārāṇasyāṃ viharata ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
K10bsu022_u:8030: dṛṣṭvā ca tathāgatasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
K10bsu022_u:8031: te hi mama sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājñāsyanti /
K10bsu022_u:8033: caritāvino hi te bhikṣavaḥ suparipaṇḍitaśukladharmāṇo mokṣamārgābhimukhā nibandhāpanītāḥ //
K10bsu022_u:8034: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgata evamanuvicintya bodhimaṇḍādutthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K10bsu022_u:8035: lokadhātuṃ saṃprakampyānupūrveṇa magadheṣu caryāṃ caran kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:8036: atha gayāyāṃ bodhimaṇḍasya cāntarādanyatama ājīvako 'drākṣīttathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam /
K10bsu022_u:8039: ekānte sthitaśca bhikṣava ājīvakastathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā evamāha - viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi /
K10bsu022_u:8040: pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāsaśca te chavivarṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma śāradaṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍuravarṇaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ bhavati,
K10bsu022_u:8041: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam /
K10bsu022_u:8042: tadyathāpi nāma tālaphalasya pakvasya samanantaravṛntacyutasya bandhanāśrayaḥ pītanirbhāso bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:8043: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam /
K10bsu022_u:8044: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadavarṇaniṣkaḥ ulkāmukhaprakṛṣṭo dakṣiṇakarmāraputreṇa suparikarmakṛtaḥ
K10bsu022_u:8045: pāṇḍukambalopanikṣipto varṇavān bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāso 'tīva prabhāsvaraḥ,
K10bsu022_u:8051: ācāryo na hi me kaścitsadṛśo me na vidyate /
K10bsu022_u:8057: so 'vocat - jinaṃ khalu gautama mātmānaṃ pratijānīṣe /
K10bsu022_u:8059: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā āśravakṣayam /
K10bsu022_u:8060: jitā me pāpakā dharmāstenopaga jino hyaham // Lal_26.3 //
K10bsu022_u:8064: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
K10bsu022_u:8066: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyami gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
K10bsu022_u:8068: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
K10bsu022_u:8070: tadbhaviṣyasi gautama ityuktvā sa ājīvako dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prākrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:8072: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato gayāyāṃ sudarśanena nāgarājena nimantrito 'bhut vāsena bhaktena ca /
K10bsu022_u:8076: eṣu ca sarveṣu bhikṣavastathāgato gṛhapatibhirbhaktena vāsena copanimantryamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa gaṅgāyā nadyāstīramupāgamat //
K10bsu022_u:8077: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgā mahānadī suparipūrṇā samatīrthakā vahati sma //
K10bsu022_u:8080: na me 'sti mārṣa tarapaṇyamityuktvā tathāgato vihāyasā pathā tīrātparaṃ tīramagamat /
K10bsu022_u:8081: tataḥ sa nāvikastaṃ dṛṣṭvātīva vipratisāryabhūt - evaṃvidho dakṣiṇīyo mayā na tārita iti /
K10bsu022_u:8082: hā kaṣṭamiti kṛtvā mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patitaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8083: tata enāṃ prakṛtiṃ nāviko rājñe bimbisārāya ārocayāmāsa - śramaṇaḥ svāmi gautamastarapaṇyaṃ yācamāno nāsti tarapaṇyamityuktvā vihāyasā atastīrātparaṃ tīraṃ gata iti /
K10bsu022_u:8084: tacchrutvā tadagreṇa rājñā bimbisāreṇa sarvapravrajitānāṃ tarapaṇyamutsṛṣṭamabhavat //
K10bsu022_u:8085: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato 'nupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu022_u:8086: upasaṃkramya kālyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
K10bsu022_u:8087: tasyāṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ yena ṛṣipatano mṛgadāvo yena ca pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
K10bsu022_u:8088: adrākṣuḥ khalu punaḥ pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam /
K10bsu022_u:8089: dṛṣṭvā ca kriyābandhamakārṣuḥ - eṣa sa āyuṣmantaḥ śramaṇo gautama āgacchati sma śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8090: anena khalvapi tayāpi tāvatpūrvikayā duṣkaracaryayā na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
K10bsu022_u:8094: na pātracīvaraṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ nāśanaṃ dātavyaṃ na pānīyaṃ paribhogyaṃ na pādapratiṣṭhānaṃ sthāpayitvātiriktānyāsanāni /
K10bsu022_u:8100: yathā yathā ca bhikṣavastathāgato yena pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma,
K10bsu022_u:8101: tathā tathā te svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
K10bsu022_u:8103: tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ pañjaragataḥ syāt,
K10bsu022_u:8106: evameva yathā yathā tathāgataḥ pañcakānāṃ bhadravargīyāṇāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāmati sma,
K10bsu022_u:8107: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
K10bsu022_u:8109: tatkasmāt? na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yastathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā āsanānna pratyuttiṣṭhet /
K10bsu022_u:8110: yathā yathā ca tathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānupasaṃkrāmati sma,
K10bsu022_u:8111: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamānā āsanebhyaḥ prakampyamānāḥ sarve kriyākāraṃ bhittvā cotthāyāsanebhyaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:8116: evaṃ cāvocat - svāgataṃ te āyuṣman gautama,
K10bsu022_u:8120: pañcakā pi bhadravargīyāste tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvaikānte niṣeduḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8121: ekānte niṣaṇṇāśca te pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatametadavocan - viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautamendriyāṇi,
K10bsu022_u:8124: evamukte bhikṣavastathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānevamāha - mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatamāyuṣmadvādena samudācariṣṭa /
K10bsu022_u:8126: amṛtaṃ mayā bhikṣavaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'mṛtagāmī ca mārgaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8132: yathā mayā samyagavavaditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā yūyamapyāśravāṇāṃ cetovimuktaṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ
K10bsu022_u:8133: ca dṛṣṭa eva dharme sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyatha - kṣīṇā no jātiruṣitaṃ ca brahmacaryam,
K10bsu022_u:8136: nanu ca yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmanta āgacchati śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭa iti pūrvavat /
K10bsu022_u:8138: teṣāṃ ca ehi bhikṣava ityukte yatkiṃcittīrthikaliṅgaṃ tīrthikadhvajaḥ,
K10bsu022_u:8144: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ pañcakā bhadravargīyā bhikṣavastathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyātyayaṃ deśayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:8145: tathāgatasyāntike śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ premaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:8146: gauravajātāśca bahuvicitrapuṣkariṇyāṃ tathāgatasya snānaparikarma kurvanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:8148: ca bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - kasmin khalu pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairniṣadya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
K10bsu022_u:8151: atha tathāgataḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ gauraveṇa trīṇyāsanāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtya siṃha iva nirbhīścaturtha āsane paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma
K10bsu022_u:8152: pañcakā api bhikṣavastathāgatasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya tathāgatasya purato niṣeduḥ //
K10bsu022_u:8153: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpāṃ kāyātprabhāṃ tathāgataḥ prāmuñcadyayā prabhayā ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
K10bsu022_u:8154: tena cāvabhāsena yā api lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrā yatremau candrasūryau
K10bsu022_u:8155: evaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃ mahānubhāvāvevaṃ maheśākhyau ābhayā ābhāṃ varṇenaṃ varṇaṃ tejasā
K10bsu022_u:8157: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuṃ prasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma,
K10bsu022_u:8158: tatrāpi tasmin samaye mahata udārasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhut /
K10bsu022_u:8159: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāste tenāvabhāsena parisphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ paśyanti sma /
K10bsu022_u:8161: evaṃ cāhuḥ - anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ,
K10bsu022_u:8162: anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ iti /
K10bsu022_u:8163: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamabhūt - akampat prākampat saṃprākampat /
K10bsu022_u:8180: tasmiṃśca samaye harṣaṇīyāstoṣaṇīyāḥ premaṇīyāḥ prasādanīyā avalokanīyāḥ prahlādanīyā nirvarṇanīyā aprativarṇanīyā asecanīyā apratikūlā anuttrāsakarāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:8181: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin kṣaṇe viheṭhā vā trāso vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vābhūt /
K10bsu022_u:8182: na ca bhūyaḥ sūryacandramasorna śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe prabhāḥ prajñāyante sma /
K10bsu022_u:8183: sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokopapannāśca sattvāstasmin kṣaṇe vigataduḥkhā abhuvan sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8184: na ca kasyacitsattvasya rāgo bādhate sma,
K10bsu022_u:8185: dveṣo vā moho vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā mado vā krodho vā vyāpādo vā paridāho vā /
K10bsu022_u:8186: sarvasattvāstasmin kṣaṇe maitracittāḥ hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino 'bhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:8192: brahmasvarāmatha giraṃ pramumoca jagatyahaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ // Lal_26.8 //
K10bsu022_u:8195: sabalaṃ nihatya māraṃ bodhiprāpto hitāya lokasya /
K10bsu022_u:8198: adhivāsitaṃ ca muninā loke kāruṇyamutpādya // Lal_26.11 //
K10bsu022_u:8201: yaḥ śrotukāmu dharmaṃ yaḥ kalpanayutaiḥ samārjitu jinena /
K10bsu022_u:8204: śreṣṭhaṃ ca dharmaśravaṇaṃ aṣṭākṣaṇavivarjana durāpāḥ // Lal_26.14 //
K10bsu022_u:8205: prāptāśca te 'dya sarve buddhotpādaḥ kṣaṇastathā śraddhā /
K10bsu022_u:8207: bhavati kadācidavasthā yaḥ kalpanayutairna śrūyate dharmaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8208: saṃprāptaḥ sa ca vādya pramādamakhilaṃ vivarjayata // Lal_26.16 //
K10bsu022_u:8210: āyāta laghuṃ sarve vartayitā nāyako hyamṛtacakram // Lal_26.17 //
K10bsu022_u:8212: tyaktvā devasamṛddhiṃ prāptā buddhasya te pārśve // Lal_26.18 //
K10bsu022_u:8213: iti hi bhikṣavo bhaumaidevairvārāṇasyāṃ ṛpipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8214: tathāgatasya mahāmaṇḍalamātro 'dhiṣṭhito 'bhūt citro darśanīyo vipulo vistīrṇaḥ saptayojanaśatānyāyāmo vistāreṇa /
K10bsu022_u:8216: kāmāvacarai rūpāvacaraiśca devaputraiścaturaśītisiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatāyopanāmitānyabhūvan - iha niṣadya bhagavān dharmacakraṃ pravartayatu asmākamanukampāmupādāyeti //
K10bsu022_u:8217: atha khalu bhikṣavastasmin samaye pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhya ūrdhvamadhaḥ
K10bsu022_u:8218: samantāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahavo bodhisattvakoṭyaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasamanvāgatā āgatya
K10bsu022_u:8220: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakro vā brahmā vā lokapālā (Vaidya 301)
K10bsu022_u:8221: vā tadanye vā maheśākhyamaheśākhyā devaputrāste 'pi sarve tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ
K10bsu022_u:8222: śirobhiḥ praṇipatya tathāgatamadhyeṣante sma dharmacakrapravartanāya - pravartayatu
K10bsu022_u:8224: pravartayatu sugato dharmacakraṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K10bsu022_u:8231: trisahasra ito bahu brahma sureśvara pāla tathā
K10bsu022_u:8233: smara pūrvapratijñāṃ mahāmuni yā tvaya vāca kṛtā
K10bsu022_u:8234: ahu jyeṣṭhu viśiṣṭu prajāya kariṣye dukhasya kṣayam // Lal_26.19 //
K10bsu022_u:8235: tvaya dharṣitu mārū sasainyu drumendri sthihitva mune
K10bsu022_u:8237: abhiprāyu prapūrṇa aśeṣa ya cintita kalpaśatā
K10bsu022_u:8238: janatāṃ prasamīkṣya anāyika vartaya cakravaram // Lal_26.20 //
K10bsu022_u:8242: stavayiṃsu tathāgatu bhūtaguṇebhi adhyeṣitu kāruṇikam // Lal_26.21 //
K10bsu022_u:8245: aṣṭāṅgikamārgajalo dhara varṣa samehi jagasya tṛṣāṃ
K10bsu022_u:8251: ṣaḍi pāramite cirarātru vivardhitu kośu tvayā
K10bsu022_u:8252: asamaṃ tu acālyu praṇītu susaṃcitu dharmadhanam /
K10bsu022_u:8253: praja sarva anātha daridra anāyika dṛṣṭva imāṃ
K10bsu022_u:8254: vicaraṃ dhana sapta vināyaka cakra pravartayahī // Lal_26.24 //
K10bsu022_u:8256: dhanadhānya hiraṇyasuvarṇa tathaiva ca vastra śubhā
K10bsu022_u:8257: vara puṣpa vilepana dhūpana cūrṇa gṛhāśca varāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8259: jina bodhi gaveṣata sātivibuddha pravartaya cakravaram // Lal_26.25 //
K10bsu022_u:8260: tatha śīlu akhaṇḍu akalmaṣu rakṣitu kalpaśatāṃ
K10bsu022_u:8261: sada kṣānti subhāvita vīrya alīnu abhūṣi tava /
K10bsu022_u:8262: vara dhyāna abhijña vipaśyana prajña upekṣa mune
K10bsu022_u:8263: paripūrṇa manoratha nirjvara vartaya cakravaram // Lal_26.26 //
K10bsu022_u:8264: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ
K10bsu022_u:8266: sahasrāraṃ sahasraraśmi sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sapuṣpadāmaṃ sahemajālaṃ sakiṅkiṇījālaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8273: dīpaṃkareṇa yada vyākṛtu śuddhasattvo buddho bhaviṣyasi hi tvaṃ narasiṃhasiṃhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8274: tasmiṃ samāsi praṇidhī iyamevarūpā saṃbodhiprāptu ahu dharma adhyeṣayeyam // Lal_26.27 //
K10bsu022_u:8275: na ca śakya sarvi gaṇanāya anupraveṣṭuṃ ye āgatā daśadiśebhirihāgrasattvāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8276: adhyeṣi śākyakulanandana dharmacakre prahvā kṛtāñjalipuṭāścaraṇau nipatya // Lal_26.28 //
K10bsu022_u:8277: yā bodhimaṇḍi prakṛtā ca surairviyūhā yā vā viyūha kṛta sarvajinātmajebhiḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8278: sā sarva saṃsthita viyūha ti dharmacakre paripūrṇakalpa bhaṇamānu kṣayaṃ na gacchet // Lal_26.29 //
K10bsu022_u:8279: trisahasri loki gaganaṃ sphuṭa devasaṃghaiḥ dharaṇītalaṃ asurakinnaramānuṣaiśca /
K10bsu022_u:8280: utkāsaśabdu napi śrūyati tanmuhūrtaṃ sarvi prasannamanaso jinamabhyudīkṣan // Lal_26.30 //
K10bsu022_u:8282: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato rātryāḥ prathame yāme tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:8283: rātryā madhyame yāme saṃrañjanīyāṃ kathāṃ pravartayati sma /
K10bsu022_u:8284: rātryāḥ paścime yāme pañcakān bhadravargīyānāmantryaitadavocat - dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ pravrajitasyāntāvakramau /
K10bsu022_u:8285: yaśca kāmeṣu kāmasukhallikā yogo hīno grāmyaḥ pārthagjaniko nālamāryo 'narthopasaṃhito
K10bsu022_u:8286: nāyatyāṃ brahmacaryāya na nirvide na virāgāya na nirodhāya nābhijñāya na saṃbodhaye
K10bsu022_u:8288: yā ceyamamadhyamā pratipadā ātmakāyaklamathānuyogo duḥkho 'narthopasaṃhito dṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhaścāyatyāṃ ca duḥkhavipākaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8289: etau ca bhikṣavo dvāvantāvanupagamya madhyamayaiva pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati
K10bsu022_u:8290: - yaduta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ
K10bsu022_u:8296: jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi apriyasaṃprayogo 'pi priyaviprayogo 'pi duḥkham /
K10bsu022_u:8297: yadapi icchan paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
K10bsu022_u:8301: yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī ayamucyate duḥkhasamudayaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8303: yo 'syā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ punarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā janikāyā nirvartikāyā aśeṣo virāgo nirodhaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ
K10bsu022_u:8310: iti duḥkhamiti me bhikṣavaḥ purvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamutpannaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8311: cakṣurutpannaṃ vidyotpannā bhūrirutpannā meghotpannā prajñotpannā ālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8312: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudaya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamutpannaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8313: cakṣurutpannaṃ vidyotpannā bhūrirutpannā meghotpannā prajñotpannā ālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8314: ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iti me bhikṣavaḥ sarvaṃ pūrvavadyāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8315: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadeva peyālaṃ yāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8316: yatkhalvidaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñeyamiti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadeva peyālaṃ yāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8317: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ prahātavya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśrateṣu dharmeṣu sarvaṃ yāvadāloka iti /
K10bsu022_u:8318: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadyāvadāloka iti /
K10bsu022_u:8319: sā khalviyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadbhāvayitavyeti pūrvavadyāvadāloka iti /
K10bsu022_u:8320: tatkhalvidaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñātamiti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśrateṣu iti peyālam /
K10bsu022_u:8321: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ prahīṇa iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteti peyālam /
K10bsu022_u:8322: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteti peyālam /
K10bsu022_u:8323: sā khalviyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadbhāviteti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu
K10bsu022_u:8327: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvadeva me eṣu caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvato evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate,
K10bsu022_u:8328: na tāvadahaṃ bhikṣavo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'smi iti pratijñāsiṣam /
K10bsu022_u:8330: yataśca me bhikṣava eṣu caturṣvāryasatyeṣvevaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ jñānadarśanamutpannam,
K10bsu022_u:8340: vācāya brahmaruta kinnaragarjitāya aṃśaiḥ sahasranayutebhi samudgatāya /
K10bsu022_u:8341: bahukalpakoṭi sada satyasubhāvitāya kauṇḍinyamālapati śākyamuniḥ svayaṃbhūḥ // Lal_26.31 //
K10bsu022_u:8342: cakṣuranityamadhruvaṃ tatha śrota ghrāṇaṃ jihvā pi kāya mana duḥkhā anātma śūnyā /
K10bsu022_u:8343: jaḍāsvabhāva tṛṇakuḍma ivā nirīhā naivātra ātma na naro na ca jīvamasti // Lal_26.32 //
K10bsu022_u:8344: hetuṃ pratītya imi saṃbhuta sarvadharmā atyantadṛṣṭivigatā gaganaprakāśā /
K10bsu022_u:8345: na ca kārako 'sti tatha naiva ca vedako 'sti na ca karma paśyati kṛtaṃ hyaśubhaṃ śubhaṃ vā // Lal_26.33 //
K10bsu022_u:8346: skandhā pratītya samudeti hi duḥkhamevaṃ saṃbhonti tṛṣṇa salilena vivardhamānā /
K10bsu022_u:8347: mārgeṇa dharmasamatāya vipaśyamānā atyantakṣīṇa kṣayadharmatayā niruddhāḥ // Lal_26.34 //
K10bsu022_u:8348: saṃkalpakalpajanitena ayoniśena bhavate avidya na pi saṃbhavako 'sya kaści /
K10bsu022_u:8349: saṃskārahetu dadate na ca saṃkramo 'sti vijñānamudbhavati saṃkramaṇaṃ pratītya // Lal_26.35 //
K10bsu022_u:8350: vijñāna nāma tatha ca rūpa samutthitāsti nāme ca rūpi samudenti ṣaḍindriyāṇi /
K10bsu022_u:8351: ṣaḍindiyairnipatito iti sparśa uktaḥ sparśena tisra anuvartati vedanā ca // Lal_26.36 //
K10bsu022_u:8353: yatkiṃci vedayitu sarva satṛṣṇa uktā tṛṣṇāta sarva upajāyati duḥkhaskandhaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8354: upādānato bhavati sarva bhavapravṛttiḥ bhavapratyayā ca samudeti hi jātirasya // Lal_26.37 //
K10bsu022_u:8355: jātīnidāna jaravyādhidukhāni bhonti upapatti naika vividhā bhavapañjare 'smin /
K10bsu022_u:8356: evameṣa sarva iti pratyayato jagasya na ca ātma pudgalu na saṃkramako 'sti kaści // Lal_26.38 //
K10bsu022_u:8357: yasminna kalpu na vikalpu yonimāhuḥ yadyoniśo bhavati na tatra avidya kāci /
K10bsu022_u:8358: yasminnirodhu bhavatīha avidyatāyāḥ sarve bhavāṅga kṣayakṣīṇa kṣayaṃ niruddhā // Lal_26.39 //
K10bsu022_u:8359: evameṣa pratyayata buddha tathāgatena tena svayaṃbhu svakamātmanu vyākaroti /
K10bsu022_u:8360: na skandha āyatana dhātu vademi buddhaṃ nānyatra hetvavagamādbhavatīha buddhaḥ // Lal_26.40 //
K10bsu022_u:8361: bhūmirna cātra paratīrthika niḥsṛtānāṃ śūnyā pravādi iha īdṛśa dharmayoge /
K10bsu022_u:8362: ye pūrvabuddhacaritā suviśuddhasattvāḥ te śaknuvanti imi dharma vijānanāya // Lal_26.41 //
K10bsu022_u:8364: kauṇḍinyena ca ājñātaṃ nirvṛttā ratanā trayaḥ // Lal_26.42 //
K10bsu022_u:8366: parasparāṃ gataḥ śabdo yāvad brahmapurālayam // Lal_26.43 //
K10bsu022_u:8368: utpannā ratanā trīṇi loke paramadurlabhā // Lal_26.44 //
K10bsu022_u:8375: teṣāṃ viśodhitaṃ cakṣu muktā sarvebhi durgatī // Lal_26.47 //
K10bsu022_u:8376: daśadiśatu ananta buddhasvaro gacchi tasmiṃ kṣaṇe
K10bsu022_u:8377: ruta madhura manojña saṃśrūyante cāntarīkṣe śubha /
K10bsu022_u:8380: daśa diśita yi keci buddhaśatā sarvi tūṣṇībhutāḥ
K10bsu022_u:8381: teṣa muninaye upasthāyakāḥ sarvi pṛcchī jināṃ /
K10bsu022_u:8382: kimiti daśabalebhi dharmākathā chinna śrutvā rūtaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8383: sādhu bhaṇata śīghra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tūṣṇībhāvena sthitāḥ // Lal_26.49 //
K10bsu022_u:8386: tena hitakareṇa uttaptatā prāpta bodhiḥ śivā
K10bsu022_u:8387: cakra triparivarta prāvartitā tena tūṣṇībhutāḥ // Lal_26.50 //
K10bsu022_u:8388: imu vacana śruṇitva teṣāṃ munīsattvakoṭyaḥ śatā
K10bsu022_u:8391: kṣipra bhavema loki lokottamā dharmacakṣurdadāḥ // Lal_26.51 //
K10bsu022_u:8393: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ime bhagavan daśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitā
K10bsu022_u:8394: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavataḥ sakāśāddharmacakrapravartanavikurvaṇasya praveśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8395: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kiyadrūpaṃ tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
K10bsu022_u:8409: śūnyatācakraṃ animittacakraṃ apraṇihitacakraṃ anabhisaṃskāracakraṃ vivekacakraṃ virāgacakraṃ
K10bsu022_u:8422: nigraho mārāṇāṃ parājayastīrthikānāṃ samatikrāmaṇaṃ saṃsāraviṣayādavatāraṇaṃ buddhaviṣaye
K10bsu022_u:8425: evaṃrūpaṃ bhaitreya tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ yasya pravartanāttathāgata ityucyate /
K10bsu022_u:8650: gupto jitendriyo nāga iva sudānto hrada ivāccho 'nāvilo viprasanna ityucyate /
K10bsu022_u:8800: saṃkṣepeṇa nirdeśitaḥ vistareṇa punamaitreya tathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā nirdiśet /
K10bsu022_u:8804: yatra mārā na gāhante sarve ca paratīrthikāḥ // Lal_26.52 //
K10bsu022_u:8811: yathaite tathā taccakraṃ lokanāthena vartitam // Lal_26.55 //
K10bsu022_u:8820: cakṣuḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnyaṃ śrotaṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
K10bsu022_u:8821: jihvā kāyaṃ ca cittaṃ ca śūnyātmāno nirīhakaḥ // Lal_26.60 //
K10bsu022_u:8830: naṣṭamārgā hi ye sattvā mārgaṃ deśemi uttamam /
K10bsu022_u:8831: nayāmi pārimaṃ tīraṃ tasmādasmi vināyakaḥ // Lal_26.65 //
K10bsu022_u:8852: kṣapayetkalpa bhāṣanto na ca buddhaguṇakṣayaḥ // Lal_26.75 //
K10bsu022_u:8858: atha khalu devaputrā yaistathāgato 'dhīṣṭo 'bhūdasya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanāya
K10bsu022_u:8860: śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrasahasrāṇi ye tathāgatasya dharmacakrapravartane 'pi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
K10bsu022_u:8862: sma - ayaṃ sa mārṣā lalitavistaro nāma dharmaparyāyasūtrānto mahāvaipulyabodhisattvavikrīḍitaḥ
K10bsu022_u:8866: bodhisattvayānikāśca pudgalā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā dṛḍhataraṃ vīryamālapsyante /
K10bsu022_u:8870: yuṣmākaṃ ca taddharmadeśanādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlaṃ mahārthikaṃ bhaviṣyati mahāphalaṃ mahānuśaṃsam //
K10bsu022_u:8871: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā asya lalitavistarasya dharmaparyāyasyāñjaliṃ saṃpragṛhītaṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8883: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣitukāmasya dharmabhāṇakasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8896: ya kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇāya sādhukāraṃ dāsyati,
K10bsu022_u:8909: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8910: amātsaryacittatayā caturdiśamasya dharmaparyāyasya varṇanāṃ bhāṣiṣyate varṇanāṃ coccārayiṣyati - āgacchatemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitaṃ dhārayata vācayata cintayata svādhyāyateti,
K10bsu022_u:8922: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ supravartitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8934: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8935: evaṃcitto yaduta kathamamī sattvā eṣāmevarūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhaveyuriti,
K10bsu022_u:8942: śakro bhaviṣyati devendraḥ iyaṃ tṛtīyā mahāpuṇyatā /
K10bsu022_u:8952: ante ca tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahīnaḥ sarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8954: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavahitaśrotaḥ śroṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8967: yasmiṃśca mārṣā grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vā caṃkrame vā vihāre vā ayaṃ lalitavistaro dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8968: tatrāṣṭau bhayāni na prabhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
K10bsu022_u:8979: imāni mārṣāstatrāṣṭau bhayāni na bhaviṣyanti (sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam) //
K10bsu022_u:8980: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuṣpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K10bsu022_u:8981: naivāsya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaparyanto bhavenna ca tathāgatapratibhānasya kṣayo bhavet /
K10bsu022_u:8982: api tu khalu punarmārṣā yathaiva tathāgatasya śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanamapramāṇamaparyantam,
K10bsu022_u:8983: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati lekhayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
K10bsu022_u:8984: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudārasya dharmasya lābhinaḥ syuriti,
K10bsu022_u:8986: tataḥ khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma āyuṣmantaṃ cānandaṃ maitreyaṃ
K10bsu022_u:8988: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste paridāmyanuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā,
K10bsu022_u:8991: ityuktvā ca bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayānuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu022_u:8992: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā syuste 'rhantaḥ śariputreṇa tulyāḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8994: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuyādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8995: mālyaiḥ prakāraiśca tathāparaiśca tasmādayaṃ puṇyakṛto viśiṣyate // Lal_27.2 //
K10bsu022_u:8997: syuḥ sarvasattvā yadi pratyayairjinā tāṃ pūjayetkaścidihāpramattaḥ /
K10bsu022_u:8998: puṣpaiśca gandhaiśca vilepanaiśca kalpānanekāṃ satataṃ hi tatparam // Lal_27.3 //
K10bsu022_u:8999: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryātpraṇāmaṃ api caikaśo 'pi /
K10bsu022_u:9000: prasannācitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhate tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // Lal_27.4 //
K10bsu022_u:9001: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvā tāṃ pūjayedyaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
K10bsu022_u:9002: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānurṣairvaraiḥ kalpānanekāṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // Lal_27.5 //
K10bsu022_u:9003: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakātle tyaktvā svakāye ca tathaiva jīvitam /
K10bsu022_u:9004: vadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // Lal_27.6 //
K10bsu022_u:9005: yasyepsitaṃ pūjayituṃ vināyakāṃ pratyekabuddhāṃśca tathaiva śrāvakāṃ /
K10bsu022_u:9006: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicitta idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadhātu // Lal_27.7 //
K10bsu022_u:9008: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sadā tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // Lal_27.8 //
K10bsu022_u:9009: pratibhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantāṃ ekaṃ padaṃ vakṣyati kalpakoṭī /
K10bsu022_u:9010: na vyañjanā bhraśyati nāpi cārthā dadyācca yaḥ sūtramida parebhyaḥ // Lal_27.9 //
K10bsu022_u:9011: anuttaro 'sau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścitsadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
K10bsu022_u:9013: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // Lal_27.10 //
K10bsu022_u:9023: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu022_u:9024: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
